, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi was made to read\nTolstoy\u2019s \u2018Letter to a Hindoo\u2019, ostensibly written in reply to the letter of\nTarak Nath Das, an Indian who advocated the violent approach.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tolstoy\u2019s letter explained why non-violent\nresistance as a resolve by Indians to become free were the only solution.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi was softened up\nnice and proper , made to feel like the cat\u2019s whiskers and encouraged&nbsp; to write to Tolstoy (1 October, 1909), asking\nfor permission to print 20000 copies of the non-violent blueprint letter to a\nHindoo\u201d for distribution and having it translated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had \u2018taken the liberty\u2019\nto write the letter \u2018in the interests of truth, and in order to have your\nadvice on problems the solution of which you have made your life-work.\u2019&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi concluded: \u2018True freedom is to be\nfound\u2014only in such a life. That is the kind of freedom we want to achieve . If\nIndia were to achieve such freedom, that indeed would be swarajya.\u2019&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi had\ntold Rev. J.J. Doke, his first biographer (1909): \u2018It was the New Testament of\nBible which really awakened me to the rightness and value of Passive\nResistance. When I read in the Sermon of Jesus on the Mount such passages as\n\u201cResist not him that is evil - -\u201d I was simply overjoyed, and found my own\nopinion confirmed when I least expected it.&nbsp;\nTolstoy\u2019s The Kingdom of God Is Within You gave it a permanent form.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good grief-- wait a minute, I must\ncry now--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">( Sniff! &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BOOOO HOOOOOOOO! </b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the return journey\nfrom London to Durban by ship (13 to 22 November, 1909), Gandhi translated\nTolstoy\u2019s \u2018Letter to a Hindoo [dated December 14, 1908]\u2019 into Gujarati.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\nwrote \u2018PREFACE TO LEO TOLSTOY\u2019S \u201cLETTER TO A HINDOO\u201d [the Gujarati\ntranslation].&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Some brainwashed extracts are: \u2018Real courage and humanity consists in not returning a kick for a kick. &nbsp;This is the core of Tolstoy\u2019s teaching.\u2019</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi wrote -- Tolstoy\ngives me a simple answer -&nbsp; . We are our\nown slaves, not of the British.\u2019 ( what a priceless joke!) &nbsp;\u2018The central\nprinciple of his teaching is entirely acceptable to me, and it is set out in\nthe letter given below.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check out his muddled\nthinking-- Good grief!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018A commercial shipping company\nenslaved a Indian nation comprising 300 million - - - thirty thousand English\npeople, not athletes but rather weak and ill-looking, have enslaved 300\nmillions of vigorous, clever, strong, freedom-loving people?&nbsp; Do not the figures make it clear that not the\nEnglish but the Indians have enslaved themselves?\u2019 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tolstoy wrote to Gandhi\n(8 May, 1910)\u201d Passive resistance\u2014is a question of the greatest importance not\nonly for India but for the whole humanity.\u2019 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his fourth letter to\nLeo Tolstoy (15 August, 1910), a brainwashed Gandhi tell Tolstoy about his new\ndear friend ( planted by Leo Tolstoy himself ) Kallenbach\u2019s letter regarding\nsetting up of Tolstoy Farm near Johannesburg for the Indian passive resisters\u2019\nstruggle in Transvaal. \" Kallenbach had gone through most of the\nexperiences that Tolstoy had described in his work My Confessions\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JZHPvkvchBY/U2pYn94_eiI/AAAAAAAAsEM/SK8rDxiz8wo/s1600/imutfdrtages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JZHPvkvchBY/U2pYn94_eiI/AAAAAAAAsEM/SK8rDxiz8wo/s1600/imutfdrtages.jpg\" width=\"324\" /></a></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tolstoy wrote a brain\nformatting letter back to Gandhi&nbsp; (7\nSeptember, 1910),&nbsp; \" Love is the\naspiration for communion and solidarity with other souls - - the supreme and\nunique law of human life - -. - - - That law of love has been promulgated by\nall the philosophies\u2014Indian, Chinese, Hebrew, Greek and Roman. - - it had been\nmost clearly expressed by Christ -&nbsp; - If\nthe law of love cannot exist, therein remains no other law except that of\nviolence, that is, the right of the mighty-- Socialism, Communism, Anarchism,\nSalvation Army, the growing criminalities, unemployment and absurd luxuries of\nthe rich, augmented without limit, and the awful misery of the poor, the\nterribly increasing number of suicides\u2014all these are the signs of that inner\ncontradiction which - - can only be resolved by acceptation of the law of love\nand by the rejection of all sorts of violence. Consequently, your work in\nTransvaal - - is yet the most fundamental and the most important to us\nsupplying the most weighty practical proof in which the world can now share -\n-.\" He closed the letter \u2018With my perfect esteem\u2019. BLAH BLAH BLAAH!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good grief ! &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I must cry some\nmore! &nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BOO HOOOOOOO!!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Buxynhupd-E/UGgs95NyK-I/AAAAAAAAT9c/iXqRj1VwEPE/s1600/jjl098u.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Buxynhupd-E/UGgs95NyK-I/AAAAAAAAT9c/iXqRj1VwEPE/s1600/jjl098u.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi wrote to\nKallenbach that&nbsp; had found \u2018many gems to\nbe picked up\u2019 from Tolstoy\u2019s pamphlets&nbsp;\nsuch as, \u2018The salvation of men from the calamities which they inflict\nupon themselves can be realized only in that degree in which they are guided in\ntheir lives, not by advantages, not arguments, but by religious consciousness;-\n-.\u2019 &nbsp;He also wrote: \u2018If Tolstoy was the greatest reformer of his age in Europe,\nhe owed it to his doctrine of non-resistance.\u2019 And, he could not accept\n\u2018qualified acceptance of Tolstoy\u2019s teaching\u2019. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Tolstoy\u2019s birth centenary&nbsp; on 9 September, 1928, and Gandhi delivered a\nmemorable speech on this occasion, which included following pearls: When I went\nto England, I was a votary of violence - -. After I read this book, that lack\nof faith in non-violence vanished.&nbsp;\nTolstoy was a great advocate of non-violence in his age. - - - - no one\nin India or elsewhere who has - - tried to follow it as sincerely as he did. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I want everyone to\nlearn three things from Tolstoy\u2019s life-- choose self-restraint. We should\nresolve never to \u2018give up the pursuit of truth\u2019, for which the only right path\nis that of non-violence, which again \u2018means an ocean of love\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\nSee now I have crossed the threshold of pain--after that you enjoy-- <br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TEEE &nbsp; HEEEEEEEEEE</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-w3otr7EFBrs/UGiE7O9RpKI/AAAAAAAAUI4/R4HRszu4wi0/s1600/gttjrjd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"332\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-w3otr7EFBrs/UGiE7O9RpKI/AAAAAAAAUI4/R4HRszu4wi0/s1600/gttjrjd.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After India got\nIndependence in 1947, Britain had no use for USED CURRY LEAF Gandhi anymore. And Gandhi was\nquick to realise that.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He kept away from the British after that, for now it was\nthe turn of Nehru, to get brainwashed via Edwina Mountbatten .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Hermann Kallenback was for\nGandhi, the same as Nehru was for Edwina. &nbsp;Both reported to Rothschild's stooge\nWinston Churchill. Edwina was a Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An Indian spy ( British\nsoldier ) traitor Kirpal Singh gave away crucial information about the Gaddar\nConspiracy in Feb 2015. D day set for 21 February 1915, details of the date and\nplaces found their way to Punjab CID through Kirpal Singh, recruited at the\nlast minute. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Evtnk-45OQE/UGgtQhqRKmI/AAAAAAAAT9k/ZKgshqxOHE8/s1600/fgbnbb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sensing infiltration, a desperate Rash Behari brought forward the\nD-Day to the 19th, but carelessness allowed Kirpal Singh to report this advance\ndate to British authorities in the nick of time. &nbsp;Kirpal Singh was caught by the\nwould-be mutineers, but he managed to make good his escape under the ploy that\nhe wanted to take a crap or he would soil his pants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The D day was on 21st\nFeb 1915.&nbsp; The Bengal cell under Jatin\nBagha&nbsp; was to look for the Punjab Mail\nentering the Howrah Station the next day (which would have been cancelled if Punjab\nwas seized) and was to strike immediately.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">British soldiers in Burma ,\nSingapore would revolt and strike same day. The Indian Freedom fighters\nincarcerated in Andaman Cellular Island would be armed with guns and landing on\nIndian shores, to run over the British. 100 Germans soldiers lead by an Naval Officer\nVon Muller&nbsp; would be co-ordinating the\nattacks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rash Behari Bose\nescaped from Lahore and in May 1915 fled to Japan. Other leaders, including\nGiani Pritam Singh, Swami Satyananda Puri and others fled to Thailand. &nbsp;Jatin\nand the rest of the Bengal cell went underground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They worship false gods.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\">Evelyn\nTrent</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"> in him getting brainwashed to Communism -- to transport and spread the\nideology to India.&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
