, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I GUESS FROM 2012 &nbsp;ONWARDS I WILL CELEBRATE IT AS LAL BAHADUR SHASTRI JAYANTI ( OUR PM AFTER NEHRU AND BEFORE INDIRA GANDI ) , &nbsp;WHICH FALLS ON THE SAME DAY. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-80mbXD0eXsg/UGpAJMnS3sI/AAAAAAAAUQU/QOHlxR8bIjI/s1600/G5YY.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-80mbXD0eXsg/UGpAJMnS3sI/AAAAAAAAUQU/QOHlxR8bIjI/s1600/G5YY.jpg\" width=\"303\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE INDIANS HAVE GIVEN THIS HONEST AND HONOURABLE MAN , A VERY RAW DEAL.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE NEHRU DYNASTY DID NOT EVEN INVESTIGATE HIS DEATH IN TASHKENT. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I KNOW WHAT HAPPENED, AS IT WAS TOLD TO ME 2 DECADES AGO BY MY RUSSIAN CHIEF OFFICER, WHOSE FATHER WORKED IN KGB-- OVER A COUPLE OF VODKAS.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers died in the First World War for Britain and 243000 ( 2.43 ) lakh Indian soldiers died in the Second World War for Britain.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Indians did NOT want to fight for the cruel white English speaking Christian invader. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">See how well Rothschild groomed Gandhi in South Africa using Leo Tolstoy's mindless non-violence doctrine.</b></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>Like I said before , punch into Google search <span style=\"color: red;\">MAHATMA GANDHI, RE-WRITING INDIAN HISTORY VADAKAYIL,</span> to read part 1 of this post .</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5J1xwz6MzQE/UIDQf04waDI/AAAAAAAAVfM/7ER7KcVwO-Q/s1600/imagesg+ki7tuit.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5J1xwz6MzQE/UIDQf04waDI/AAAAAAAAVfM/7ER7KcVwO-Q/s1600/imagesg+ki7tuit.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/luNgPO-vqBw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/luNgPO-vqBw&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/luNgPO-vqBw&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qQrn22dSVm8/UIDQigoiPcI/AAAAAAAAVfU/cPS_2m73qeU/s1600/imageshlhkryo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qQrn22dSVm8/UIDQigoiPcI/AAAAAAAAVfU/cPS_2m73qeU/s400/imageshlhkryo.jpg\" width=\"323\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-blJpsihc90U/UVhWeKJNYII/AAAAAAAAhH4/x1O46WJRfZk/s1600/iuynik.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-blJpsihc90U/UVhWeKJNYII/AAAAAAAAhH4/x1O46WJRfZk/s320/iuynik.jpg\" width=\"220\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\"May it please\nYour Honour\"</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">by Nathuram Godse&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">[On 8 November 1948,\nNathuram Godse (19 May 1910-15 November 1949) rose to make his statement in\ncourt. Reading quietly from a typed manuscript, he sought to explain why he had\nkilled Gandhi. His thesis covered ninety-pages, and he was on his feet for five\nhours. Godse's statement, excerpted below, should be read by citizens and scholars\nin its entirely, for it provides an insight into his personality and his\nunderstanding of the concept of Indian nationhood \u2013 Editor]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Born in a\ndevotional Brahmin family, I instinctively came to revere Hindu religion, Hindu\nhistory and Hindu culture. I had, therefore, been intensely proud of Hinduism\nas a whole. As I grew up I developed a tendency to free thinking unfettered by\nany superstitious allegiance to any isms, political or religious. That is why I\nworked actively for the eradication of untouchability and the caste system\nbased on birth alone. I openly joined anti-caste movements and maintained that\nall Hindus are of equal status as to rights, social and religious, and should\nbe considered high or low on merit alone and not through the accident of birth\nin a particular caste or profession.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I used publicly to take\npart in organized anti-caste dinners which thousands of Hindus, Brahmins,\nVaishyas, Kshatriyas, Chamars and B-----s participated. We broke the caste\nrules and dined in the company of each other. I have read the speeches and\nwritings of Dadabhai Naoroji, Vivekanand, Gokhale, Tilak, along with the books\nof ancient and modern history of India and some prominent countries like\nEngland, France, America and Russia. Moreover I studied the tenets of socialism\nand Marxism. But above all I studied very closely what Veer (brave) Savarkar\nand Gandhiji had written and spoken, as to my mind these two ideologies have\ncontributed more to the moulding of the thought and action of the Indian people\nduring the last thirty years or so, than any other factor has done.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this thinking and\nreading led me to believe that it was my first duty to serve Hindudom and\nHindus both as a patriot and as a world citizen. To secure the freedom and to\nsafeguard the just interests of some thirty crores (three hundred million) of\nHindus would automatically constitute the freedom and well-being of all India,\none fifth of the human race. This conviction led me naturally to devote myself\nto the Hindu Sanatanist ideology and programme, which alone, I came to believe,\ncould win and preserve the National Independence of Hindustan, my Motherland,\nand enable her to render true service to humanity as well. Since the year 1920,\nthat is, after the demise of Lokmanya Tilak, Gandhi's influence in the Congress\nfirst increased and then became supreme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His activities for\npublic awakening were phenomenal in their intensity and were reinforced by the\nslogan of truth and non-violence, which he paraded ostentatiously before the\ncountry. No sensible or enlightened person could object to these slogans. In\nfact there is nothing new or original in them. They are implicit in every\nconstitutional public movement. But it is nothing but a dream if you imagine\nthe bulk of mankind is, or can ever become, capable of scrupulous adherence to\nthese lofty principles in its normal life from day to day. In fact, honour,\nduty and love of one's own kith and kin and country might often compel us to\ndisregard non-violence and to use force. I could never conceive that an armed\nresistance to an aggression is unjust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I would consider it a\nreligious and moral duty to resist and if possible, to overpower such an enemy\nby use of force. (In the Ramayana) Rama killed Ravana in a tumultuous fight and\nrelieved Sita. (In the Mahabharata) Krishna killed Kansa to end his wickedness;\nand Arjuna had to fight and slay quite a number of his friends and relations,\nincluding the revered Bhishma, because the latter was on the side of the\naggressor. It is my firm belief that in dubbing Rama, Krishna and Arjuna as\nguilty of violence, the Mahatma betrayed the total ignorance of the springs of\nhuman action. In more recent history, it was the heroic fight put up by\nChhatrapati Shivaji that first checked and eventually destroyed the Muslim tyranny\nin India. It was absolutely essential for Shivaji to overpower and kill an\naggressive Afzal Khan, failing which he would have lost his own life. In\ncondemning history's towering warriors like Shivaji, Rana Pratap and Guru\nGovind Singh as misguided patriots, Gandhi has merely exposed his self-conceit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was, paradoxical, as\nit may appear, a violent pacifist who brought untold calamities on the country\nin the name of truth and non-violence, while Rana Pratap, Shivaji and the Guru\nwill remain enshrined in the hearts of their countrymen forever for the freedom\nthey brought to them. The accumulating provocation of thirty-two years,\nculminating in his last pro-Muslim fast, at last goaded me to the conclusion\nthat the existence of Gandhi should be brought to an end immediately. Gandhi\nhad done very good work in South Africa to uphold the rights and well being of\nthe Indian community there.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But when he finally\nreturned to India, he developed a subjective mentality under which he alone was\nto be the final judge of what was right or wrong. If the country wanted his\nleadership, it had to accept his infallibility; if it did not, he would stand\naloof from the Congress and carry on in his own way. Against such an attitude\nthere can be no halfway house. Either Congress had to surrender its will to his\nand had to be content with playing second fiddle to all his eccentricity,\nwhimsicality, metaphysics and primitive vision, or it had to carry on without\nhim. He alone was the judge of everyone and everything; he was the master brain\nguiding the Civil Disobedience movement; no other could know the technique of\nthat movement. He alone knew when to begin it and when to withdraw it. The\nmovement might succeed or fail, but that could make no difference to the\nMahatma's infallibility. 'A Satyagrahi can never fail' was his formula for his\nown infallibility and nobody except himself knew what a Satyagrahi is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus the Mahatma became\nthe judge and the jury in his own case. These childish insanities and\nobstinacies, coupled with a most severe austerity of life, ceaseless work and lofty\ncharacter made Gandhi formidable and irresistible. Many people thought that his\npolicies were irrational, but they had either to withdraw from the Congress or\nplace their intelligence at his feet to do with as he liked. In a position of\nsuch absolute irresponsibility, Gandhi was guilty of blunder after blunder,\nfailure after failure, and disaster after disaster. Gandhi's pro-Muslim policy\nis blatantly illustrated in his perverse attitude on the question of the\nnational language of India. It is quite obvious that Hindi has the most prior\nclaim to be accepted as the premier language.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the beginning of his\ncareer in India, Gandhi gave a great impetus to Hindi, but as he found that the\nMuslims did not like it, he became a champion of what is called Hindustani.\nEverybody in India knows that there is no language in India called Hindustani;\nit has no grammar; it has no vocabulary. It is a mere dialect; it is spoken,\nnot written. It is a tongue and a crossbreed between Hindi and Urdu, and not\neven the Mahatma's sophistry could make it popular. But in his desire to please\nthe Muslims he insisted that Hindustani alone should be the national language\nof India. His blind followers, of course, supported him and the so-called\nhybrid language began to be used. The charm and the purity of the Hindi\nlanguage were to be prostituted to please the Muslims. All his experiments were\nat the expense of the Hindus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From August 1946\nonwards, the private armies of the Muslim League began a massacre of Hindus.\nThe then Viceroy, Lord Wavell, though distressed at what was happening, would\nnot use his powers under the Government of India Act of 1935 to prevent the\nrape, murder and arson. The Hindu blood began to flow from Bengal to Karachi\nwith little retaliation by the Hindus. The Interim Government formed in\nSeptember was sabotaged by its Muslim League members right from its inception,\nbut the more they became disloyal and treasonable to the government of which\nthey were a part, the greater was Gandhi's infatuation for them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Wavell had to\nresign as he could not bring about a settlement and was succeeded by Lord\nMountbatten. King Stork followed King Log. The Congress, which had boasted of\nits nationalism and secularism, secretly accepted Pakistan literally at the\npoint of the bayonet and abjectly surrendered to Jinnah. India was vivisected\nand one-third of the Indian Territory became foreign land to us from 15 August\n1947. Lord Mountbatten came to be described in the Congress circles as the\ngreatest Viceroy and Governor-General this country ever had.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The official date for\nthe handing over of power was fixed for June 30, 1948, but Mountbatten with his\nruthless surgery gave us a gift of vivisected India ten months in advance. This\nis what Gandhi had achieved after thirty years of undisputed dictatorship and\nthis is what the Congress party calls 'freedom' and 'peaceful transfer of\npower'. The Hindu-Muslim unity bubble was finally burst and a theocratic state\nwas established with the consent of Nehru and his crowd and they have called it\n'freedom won by them with sacrifice' - whose sacrifice? When top leaders of\nCongress, with the consent of Gandhi, divided and tore the country - which we\nconsidered a deity of worship - my mind was filled with direful anger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the conditions\nimposed by Gandhi for his breaking of the fast related to the mosques in Delhi\noccupied by the Hindu refugees. But when Hindus in Pakistan were subjected to\nviolent attacks he did not so much as utter a single word to protest and\ncensure the Pakistan Government or the Muslims concerned. Gandhi was shrewd\nenough to know that while undertaking a fast unto death, had he imposed some\nconditions on the Muslims in Pakistan, there would have been found hardly any\nMuslims who could have shown some grief if the fast had ended in his death. It\nwas for this reason that he purposely avoided imposing any conditions on the\nMuslims.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was fully aware from\npast experience that Jinnah was not at all perturbed or influenced by his fast\nand the Muslim League hardly attached any value to the inner voice of Gandhi.\nGandhi is being referred to as the Father of the Nation. But if that is so, he\nhas failed in his paternal duty inasmuch he has acted very treacherously to the\nnation by his consenting to the partitioning of it. I stoutly maintain that\nGandhi has failed in his duty. He has proved to be the Father of Pakistan. His\ninner-voice, his spiritual power, his doctrine of non-violence of which so much\nis made of, all crumbled against Jinnah's iron will and proved to be powerless.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Briefly speaking, I\nthought to myself and foresaw that I shall be totally ruined, and the only\nthing I could expect from the people would be nothing but hatred and that I\nshall have lost all my honour, even more valuable than my life, if I were to kill\nGandhiji. But at the same time I thought that the Indian politics in the\nabsence of Gandhiji would surely be practical, able to retaliate and would be\npowerful with the armed forces. No doubt, my own future would be totally\nruined, but the nation would be saved from the inroads of Pakistan. People may\neven call me or dub me as devoid of any sense or foolish, but the nation would\nbe free to follow the course founded on the reason, which I consider necessary\nfor sound nation-building.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After having fully\nconsidered the question, I took the final decision in the matter, but I did not\nspeak about it to anyone whatsoever. I took courage in both my hands and I did\nfire the shots at Gandhiji on 30th January 1948, on the prayer-grounds in Birla\nHouse. I do say that my shots were fired at the person whose policy and action\nhad brought rack and ruin and destruction to millions of Hindus. There was no\nlegal machinery by which such an offender could be brought to book and for this\nreason I fired those fatal shots. I bear no ill will towards anyone\nindividually, but I do say that I had no respect for the present government\nowing to their policy, which was unfairly favourable towards the Muslims. But\nat the same time I could clearly see that the policy was entirely due to the\npresence of Gandhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have to say with\ngreat regret that Prime Minister Nehru quite forgets that his preaching and\ndeeds are at times at variance with each other when he talks about India as a\nsecular state in season and out of season, because it is significant to note\nthat Nehru has played a leading role in the theocratic state of Pakistan, and\nhis job was made easier by Gandhi's persistent policy of appeasement towards\nthe Muslims. I now stand before the court to accept the full share of my\nresponsibility for what I have done and the judge would, of course, pass\nagainst me such orders of sentence as may be considered proper. But I would\nlike to add that I do not desire any mercy to be shown to me, nor do I wish\nthat anyone should beg for mercy on my behalf.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My confidence about the\nmoral side of my action has not been shaken even by the criticism levelled\nagainst it on all sides. I have no doubt that honest writers of history will\nweigh my act and find the true value thereof someday in future.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nathuram Godse was\nhanged a year later, on 15 November 1949; as per his last wishes, his family\nand followers have preserved his ashes for immersion in the Indus River of a\nre-united India&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_VE3Q3RETE0/UVhWLrpVUVI/AAAAAAAAhHw/wtx36yj2BRU/s1600/nathuram-godse-and-mahatma-gandhi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"333\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_VE3Q3RETE0/UVhWLrpVUVI/AAAAAAAAhHw/wtx36yj2BRU/s400/nathuram-godse-and-mahatma-gandhi.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><i><br /></i></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Above : Gandhi's last moment of truth!</i></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><i><br /></i></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><i>Below Narasimha , the 4th avatar of Vishnu. &nbsp;The sphinx of Egypt is the mirrored version of Narasimha. Grace and peace!</i></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://3.gvt0.com/vi/n3quBUL5kTM/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/n3quBUL5kTM&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/n3quBUL5kTM&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span class=\"huge\" style=\"border: 0px; color: red; font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif; line-height: normal; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Virtue is more to be feared than vice, because its excesses are not subject to the regulation of conscience.</span><span style=\"line-height: normal;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;</span></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: normal;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: normal;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Remember in both First and Second World Wars, &nbsp;Gandhi urged Indians to kill Germans for the British. He did NOT want Indians to kill the British invaders .</span></span></b></span><span style=\"border: 0px; color: blue; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><br /></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: normal;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta; line-height: normal;\">Rings a bell?</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta; line-height: normal;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi\u2019s horoscope clearly\nindicates his devious, queer, suspicious , double agent nature, and what he is\ndestined to be-- with the Moon in Cancer with Rahu . &nbsp;Most pretender modern astrologers have written\nabout Gandhi\u2019s horoscope out of hindsight , without the guts to be true to their\nprofession.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-j1HBgxxPQMc/UYUj8iHKDoI/AAAAAAAAiB0/B6VbsNqkfqA/s1600/xswc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-j1HBgxxPQMc/UYUj8iHKDoI/AAAAAAAAiB0/B6VbsNqkfqA/s1600/xswc.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>NATHU RAM GODSE'S\nSPEECH AT THE TRIAL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Nathuram Godse's speech\nat trial .. DO read it fully<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Full text of Godse's\nspeech at his trial.....<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>\" On January 13,\n1948, I learnt that Gandhiji had decided to go on fast unto<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>death. The reason given\nwas that he wanted an assurance of Hindu-Muslim<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Unity... But I and many\nothers could easily see that the real motive...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>[was] to compel the\nDominion Government to pay the sum of Rs 55 crores to<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Pakistan, the payment\nof which was emphatically refused by the<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Government.... But this\ndecision of the people's Government was reversed to<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>suit the tune of\nGandhiji's fast. It was evident to my mind that the force<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>of public opinion was\nnothing but a trifle when compared with the leanings<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>of Gandhiji favourable\nto Pakistan.<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....In 1946 or\nthereabout, Muslim atrocities perpetrated on Hindus under the<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Government patronage of\nSurhawardy in Noakhali made our blood boil. Our<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>shame and indignation\nknew no bounds when we saw that Gandhiji had come<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>forward to shield that\nvery Surhawardy and began to style him as 'Shaheed<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Saheb' - a martyr -\neven in his prayer meetings...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....Gandhiji's\ninfluence in the Congress first increased and then became<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>supreme. His activities\nfor public awakening were phenomenal in their<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>intensity and were\nreinforced by the slogans of truth and non-violence which<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>he ostentatiously\nparaded before the country... I could never conceive that<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>an armed resistance to\nthe aggressor is unjust... Ram killed Ravan in a<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>tumultuous fight...\nKrishna killed Kansa to end his wickedness... In<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>condemning Shivaji,\nRana Pratap and Guru Govind as 'misguided patriots,'<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Gandhiji has merely\nexposed his self-conceit... Gandhiji was, paradoxically,<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>a violent pacifist who\nbrought untold calamities on the country in the name<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>of truth and\nnonviolence, while Rana Pratap, Shivaji and the Guru will<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>remain enshrined in the\nhearts of their countrymen forever...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....By 1919, Gandhiji\nhad become desperate in his endeavours to get the<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Muslims to trust him\nand went from one absurd promise to another... He<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>backed the Khilafat\nmovement in this country and was able to enlist the full<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>support of the National\nCongress in that policy... very soon the Moplah<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Rebellion showed that\nthe Muslims had not the slightest idea of national<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>unity... There followed\na huge slaughter of Hindus... The British<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Government, entirely\nunmoved by the rebellion, suppressed it in a few months<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>and left to Gandhiji\nthe joy of his Hindu-Muslim Unity... British<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Imperialism emerged\nstronger, the Muslims became more fanatical, and the<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>consequences were\nvisited on the Hindus...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>The accumulating\nprovocation of 32 years, culminating in his last pro-Muslim<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>fast, at last goaded me\nto the conclusion that the existence of Gandhiji<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>should be brought to an\nend immediately... he developed a subjective<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>mentality under which\nhe alone was the final judge of what was right or<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>wrong... Either\nCongress had to surrender its will to him and play second<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>fiddle to all his\neccentricity, whimsicality... or it had to carry on<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>without him... He was\nthe master brain guiding the civil disobedience<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>movement... The\nmovement may succeed or fail; it may bring untold disasters<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>and political reverses,\nbut that could make no difference to the Mahatma's<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>infallibility... These\nchildish inanities and obstinacies, coupled with a<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>most severe austerity\nof life, ceaseless work and lofty character, made<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Gandhiji formidable and\nirresistible... In a position of such absolute<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>irresponsibility,\nGandhiji was guilty of blunder after blunder...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....The Mahatma even\nsupported the separation of Sindh from the Bombay<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Presidency and threw\nthe Hindus of Sindh to the communal wolves. Numerous<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>riots took place in\nKarachi, Sukkur, Shikarpur and other places in which the<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Hindus were the only\nsufferers...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....From August 1946\nonwards, the private armies of the Muslim League began<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>a massacre of the\nHindus... Hindu blood began to flow from Bengal to Karachi<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>with mild reactions in\nthe Deccan... The Interim government formed in<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>September was sabotaged\nby its Muslim League members, but the more they<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>became disloyal and\ntreasonable to the government of which they were a part,<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>the greater was\nGandhi's infatuation for them...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....The Congress, which\nhad boasted of its nationalism and socialism,<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>secretly accepted\nPakistan and abjectly surrendered to Jinnah. India was<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>vivisected and one-third\nof the Indian territory became foreign land to<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>us... This is what\nGandhiji had achieved after 30 years of undisputed<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>dictatorship, and this\nis what Congress party calls 'freedom'...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....One of the\nconditions imposed by Gandhiji for his breaking of the fast<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>unto death related to\nthe mosques in Delhi occupied by Hindu refugees. But<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>when Hindus in Pakistan\nwere subjected to violent attacks he did not so much<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>as utter a single word\nto protest and censure the Pakistan government...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Gandhi is being\nreferred to as the Father of the Nation. But if that is so,<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>he had failed his\npaternal duty inasmuch as he has acted very treacherously<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>to the nation by his\nconsenting to the partitioning of it... The people of<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>this country were eager\nand vehement in their opposition to Pakistan. But<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Gandhiji played false\nwith the people...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....I shall be totally\nruined, and the only thing I could expect from the <o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>people would be nothing\nbut hatred... if I were to kill Gandhiji. But at the<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>same time, I felt that\nIndian politics in the absence of Gandhiji would<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>surely be proved\npractical, able to retaliate, and be powerful with armed<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>forces. No doubt, my\nown future would be totally ruined, but the nation<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>would be saved from the\ninroads of Pakistan...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....I do say that my\nshots were fired at the person whose policy and action<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>had brought rack and\nruin and destruction to millions of Hindus... There was<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>no legal machinery by\nwhich such an offender could be brought to book, and<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>for this reason I fired\nthose fatal shots...<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>....I do not desire any\nmercy to be shown to me... I did fire shots at<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Gandhiji in open\ndaylight. I did not make any attempt to run away; in fact I<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>never entertained any\nidea of running away. Mumbai's Muhammad Ali road is named after this JEW. I have seen his KOSHER grave in Jerusalem..<br />\n<br />\nOn 29 December 1930 JEW Sir Muhammad Iqbal delivered his monumental presidential address to the All India Muslim League annual session, demanding Pakistan.<br />\n<br />\nJinnah was a JEW. At a League conference in Lahore in 1940, Jinnah demanded Pakistan.<br />\n<br />\nBY 1947, ALL MAJOR MUSLIM KINGDOMS IN INDIA WERE RULED BY CRYPTO JEWS.<br />\n<br />\nMAJJA HAI-- KISSI KOH KUCH NAHIN PATHA.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_167MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHi Captain,<br />\n<br />\nThis comment is copied from t comment section of Rajiv Malhotra's wall on fb ....an \"Agma Pride\" guy is demeaning Sanskirt .....and many other \"Agma pride\" guys hv liked his comment ...I was very tempted to answer his comment with facts but refrained myself as it would b like hitting head against wall<br />\n<br />\nhere is t comment made by \"agma pride\"<br />\n<br />\n\"Why can't we take it as artha sastra was copied from Thirukural. Sanskrit has no script till date. It depends upon the script of other languages. Tamil has the script very long back . It has been proved by the excavations conducted in various places including Egypt and Thailand. Jaffna site is one among those in which Tamil script was found used during BC 1500 Years. The word Thirazh muri which means an agenda approved in a meeting. Such a valid proof is available for Tamil Language.No other language has such a valid proof as Tamil has. Except Asokas script in India all other scripts are found during Guptas period only. In Asoka's script was not used to write Sanskrit. So all the Sanskrit literatures were written around A.D. 4 th century. But Thirukural was written during BC 2 nd century . As such how this gentleman Nagasamy does claim that Thirukural is the copy of Artha Sastra. Same philosophy may reflect in different literatures. Only timeline will decide which one is copied from which one. Is is not humour a language which has not script at all can be taken as the pioneer for all other literatures of other language Tamil Which has the script discovered before 3500 years. More over Sanskrit means \"corrected one\". By its name itself certainly Sanskrit may be derived language. So all the Sanskrit literatures might have been copied from other indian languages like Tamil. Mr. Nagasamy's voice may be from his haterdness on Tamils. This Rajive Malhotra has tried to destabilise the Tamil forum reasonably formed in Basten University.\" BY \u0ba4.\u0b95. \u0ba8\u0bbf\u0ba4\u0bbf<br />\n<br />\nI JUST DON'T UNDERSTAND Y T HELL THEY HAVE SO MUCH HATRED FOR SANSKRIT?? Some of the padres were professional printers and linguists in religious garb. Pope (1820-1907) who called himself \u201cPope Iyer.\u201d, Scotsman Robert Caldwell (1814-1891) who along with his wife Elissa Mault did massive conversions by offering sops, Portuguese missionary John De Britto etc etc.<br />\n<br />\nThe Madras Catholic Diocese, has been on a amazing campaign that, \u201cThiruvalluvar was a disciple of St. Thomas and that Thirukkural have been lifted from the teachings of St. Thomas\u2014nonsense.<br />\n<br />\nTHOMAS THE DISCIPLE OF JESUS -- BOTH NEVER EXISTED.<br />\n<br />\nBishop Robert Caldwell (1814\u20131891) was an Christian Evangelist missionary and linguist, who came to India to poison Hindusim, by translating and printing books in Tamil. He got into a deal with Tamilian Iyers for plum administrative posts in the British Raj.<br />\n<br />\nFor poisoning the Hindu texts , in return he established Tamil as the oldest language\u2014which gave an ego massage to Tamils.<br />\n<br />\nBishop Robert Caldwell academically established the Dravidian family of languages in a false immoral manner . He served as Assistant Bishop of Tirunelveli from 1877. Poisoning Hinduism made atheists and British stooges like EVR Periyar happy.<br />\n<br />\nThe Government of Tamil Nadu honoured his 'historic contribution to Tamil' with a memorial and issued a stamp in his name. On the Madras Marina, a statue of Caldwell was erected .<br />\n<br />\nEvery patriotic Indian must know what this white Christain man did to divide Hindus. TEE HEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nIt is comprised of 1330 pairs each with exactly 7 words.<br />\n<br />\nThere are 133 chapters and 3 parts. The 3 main parts are:<br />\nAram (Dharma / Justice)<br />\nPorul (Artha / Wealth &amp; Power)<br />\nInbam (Kamam / Love &amp; Sex).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe book on A\u1e5fam (virtue) contains 380 verses, that of Poru\u1e37 (wealth) has 700 and that of Inbam ( kama sex) has 250.<br />\nThere are two parts of Thirukkural's Kama<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_164MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_164BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_164B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_165B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8235661969138140139\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_165M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/henry-ford-victim-of-jewish-retribution_6.html?showComment=1525741329647#c8235661969138140139\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 6:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_165MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nKalaviyal - This goes into a secret love (or pre-marital love or affair). There are plenty of tips on how to recognize the signs of love and how to impress the lover. It also goes into what it likes to miss a lover and how to embrace the right way.<br />\nInteresting quotes:<br />\nIt is difficult to understand<br />\nThe essence of the knight is the shoulder<br />\nThis girl has the elixir in her shoulders. Whenever I hug her, I get reborn.<br />\n<br />\nMedication for dysfunction<br />\nThe medicine itself is for self<br />\nThere is medicine for every illness. But for the one who is missing his lover, there can not be better than meeting his love.<br />\n<br />\nI do not know how to look<br />\nYambatta Thambata River<br />\nIf you are laughing at someone else's love and pulling his legs, it is because you never never in love.<br />\n<br />\n2. Karpiyal - This goes into the marital love. These 18 chapters come at the end of the book and deals with separation, anger, memories, complaining and feigned anger.<br />\n<br />\nYerunangan lover of love<br />\nNo one is anyone<br />\nWhen I say to her that she is dear to me than everybody, she still asks me whom I compare her with.<br />\n<br />\nOthers do not care<br />\nEye to eye<br />\nThe person who stole my heart does not seem to be interested in hugging me. I can not even find him. This is breaking my heart.<br />\n<br />\nChapter entitled \"Prostitutes\": For gold, not love their tongue cajoles men are ruined by bangled belles (911)<br />\nThe false embrance of whores is like that of a damned corpse in the dark {913)<br />\n(allusion to necrophilia,a rare sexual deviation)<br />\nThiruvalluvar considers sexuality broadly under two headings \"Courting in secrecy\" and \"Chaste married life\"<br />\nOn this banglod beauty dwell the joys of sight sound touch taste smell (1101)<br />\nJoy is the fast embrace that doth not admit even air between both (1108)<br />\nIn the fore - play the beauty of the woman is extolled in many places:--<br />\n\"Beauty extolled\"<br />\nThe bamboo shouldered has pearl like smiles Fragrant breath and lance like eyes (1J13)<br />\nThe soft flower and the swan's down are like nettles to the feet of the fair.. (1120)<br />\nA sensuous kiss between the lovers is alluded to here:--<br />\nLike milk and honey the dew is sweet from her white teeth whose word is soft (1121)<br />\nLove between me and this lady is like bond between soul and body (1122)<br />\nLife with my jewel is existence Death is is severance (1124)<br />\nAs knowledge reveals past ignorance So is the belle on love gets close ..(1110)<br />\nHe comes; no sleep; he goes; no sleep; This is the fate of eyes that weep .(II79)<br />\nNights' mercy lulls all souls to sleep keeping but me for companionship (1168)<br />\nCrueller than that cruel he are midnight hours gliding slowly (1169)<br />\nOne day seems as sever to those who yearn return of distant spouse (J269)<br />\nIn wakeful hours who sees me not I meet in dreams and linger yet... {1213)<br />\nIn dreams I enjoy his love \u2013 bliss Who in wakeful hours I miss (12 J 4)<br />\nDear life ebbs away by thought of him who said we are one heart {1209)<br />\nThink of, O heart, some remedy To cure this chronic malady {1241)<br />\nFrets to gain and fears loss in gain O my heart suffers ceaseless pain.. {1295)<br />\nThese arms that swelled on nuptial day Now shrunk proclaim \"He is away\"{1233)<br />\nBereft of bracelets and old beauty Arms tell the cruel's cruelty {1235)<br />\n<br />\nMy eyes causing lust more than sea Suffer that tortune slecplessly (1175)<br />\nHe seized my beauty and modesty Leaving pangs and pallor to me ... {1183)<br />\nLover away, comes even tide like slayer to field of homicide {1224)<br />\nSulking is the salt of love : but too much of it spoils the taste {1302)<br />\nSulking is lover's delight Its delight grows when they write {1330)<br />\n<br />\n\"Shall I draw back, or yield myself, or shall both mingled be,<br />\nWhen he returns, my spouse, dear as these eyes to me.\" (Kural 1267)[26]<br />\n\"Withdraw, it burns; approach, it soothes the pain;<br />\nWhence did the maid this wondrous fire obtain?\" (Kural 1104)[27]<br />\n\"A double witchery have glances of her liquid eyes;<br />\nOne glance is glance that brings me pain; the other heals again.\" (Kural 1091)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_165MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_165BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; font-size: large;\">BAAAP RE !</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">WHAT THE FUCK IS ALL THIS ?</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">TAMIL VEDAS ?</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A DHARMIC LIFE MANUAL CALLED KAMASUTRA WAS CONVERTED TO A PERVERTED SEX MANUAL BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The four purusharthas or goals of human life are 1. Dharma (righteousness, duty and moral order) 2. Artha (wealth and prosperity) 3.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama (desirable action )</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;4. Moksha (liberation) . This is exactly what is condenses into Tirukkural.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KAMA PURUSHARTHA IS NOT LUST BUT DESIRABLE ACTION.<br /><br />KAMA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH LUST OR SEX AS IS WRITTEN BY THE WHITE INVADER</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purushartha means those actions which are proper and correct</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama is a broad subject which encompasses arts, emotions, poetry . relationships and other sciences</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The aim of life of an individual is determined by the doctrine of Purushartha. It also decides the course of life of man and lays down norms and values for the behaviour patterns.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purushartha means \u201cPurusharthate Purushartha\u201d, which are the efforts made by the individual to achieve the aims, goals and ultimate values of life.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The ultimate end of Hindu culture is to attain \u2018Moksha\u2019 or salvation and hence, man should behave in such a manner that this aim may be achieved- and this does NOT mean wanton , debauched sex..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By Purushartha we mean the pursuance of those actions which lead to the fulfillment of socially approved values and goal.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama refers to all the desires in man for the enjoyment and satisfaction and sensual gratification of the five human senses.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KAMA could be music or being creative or team spirit in sport or travelling to places of natural beauty or sitting with family at the beach or riding a fast horse or participating in a arrow shooting contest - anything which brings delight to human life and spirit .</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Kama has absolutely nothing to do with LUST and sexual orgasm.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kama would refer to the totality of the innate desires and drives of man- motivations of man.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama refers to the instinctive and emotional life of man, and provides for the satisfaction of his aesthetic urges.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sanatana Dharma wants man and woman to be happy as this is the chief purpose of life and of course the final goal of Moksha.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
