font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When the pig is NOT cared for well , and had\nto survive in adverse circumstances it can turn into a filthy creature. Pariah\nand stay dogs eat feces\u2014however a well bred dog from a good home will reject\nit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me list the bad\npoints of ill bred pigs . It is\nbetter to know all this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take a pork chop keep\nit outside the fridge for a couple of hours and then pour some coke on it. You\nwill be surprised to see Trichinosis spiral worms and maggots crawling out\nstimulated by the sugar and phosphoric acid of Coke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KXZuAV8_TA8/UGN3ZTUYuJI/AAAAAAAATZs/C9iOCDjT4cM/s1600/imagesEEEE.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"339\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KXZuAV8_TA8/UGN3ZTUYuJI/AAAAAAAATZs/C9iOCDjT4cM/s400/imagesEEEE.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pigs are inflicted by\nmore than more than a hundred diseases and dozens of different parasites and\nworms. Some of these parasite eggs cannot be killed by ordinary cooking,\nsalting or vinegar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Like humans they get\ninfluenza. Since their lungs are small, this affects exhalation . Toxins in the\nbody cant get expelled. Lung inside pork sausages can cause H1N1 flu and\ninflammatory disease to humans..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Such pigs cannot be killed even\nby snake bite.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Pigs digestive\nsystem is like humans. But it just takes about 5 hours for food to be\ndefecated. This must time is NOT enough for the toxins to be eliminated and\nhence the flesh of the pig is laden with parasites and disease causing germs.\nSome of these worms can even invade the human brain causing convulsions ,\nepilepsy , hysteria etc and has to be surgically removed. Pork is hence toxic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rcZkl9b8Nqw/UGN3TKPWf4I/AAAAAAAATZk/PJtYMaGbSkc/s1600/imagesFGJLO.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rcZkl9b8Nqw/UGN3TKPWf4I/AAAAAAAATZk/PJtYMaGbSkc/s1600/imagesFGJLO.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Pork eating gives\nyou the tape worm larva which can grow in the small intestine to 3 metres in\nlength causing weakness , anaemia and vitamin B12 deficiency..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Pork has excessive\nfat and uric acid with very little muscle building material. Indigestion, Gall\nstones, Hypertension and heart attack is the result.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- If you examine their\nfree for all sexual habits , you will be disgusted. Finally excessive pork consumption of meat eating\nnon-herbivorous types ( in deserts ) can cause your DNA to mutate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- Pig feces contain\nhundreds of coliform bacteria and microbial pathogens . Some animals have a ready made drain at their hooves.\nWhen you see pus here ( so called foot and mouth disease )-- you can rest\nassured that the whole flesh is polluted.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Culture is that complex\nwhole -- which is a potpourri of language, ideas, beliefs, customs, codes,\ninstitutions, tools, techniques, art, rituals, knowledge, morals ,law, habits ,\nfolktales , values, conventions, ceremonies etc &nbsp;--- snowballed by man as a member of the society.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of culture\ndepends upon an ability for rational or abstract possessed by humans alone. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Animals dont have it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Culture could be a\nlogical construct, or a psychic defense mechanism or even an abstraction from\nbehaviour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once established, culture\nhas a life of its own, in a cause and effect yin-yang relationship--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It flows down through\ntime from one generation to another. it is the most highly developed means of\npromoting freedom from worry and continuity of life, in a series that began\nwith the simple reflex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Man's immediate\nprehuman ancestors had societies, but they did not have culture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It can cause a person\nto die of hunger, though nourishment is available, because some foods are\nbranded unclean by the culture. This was proved with the Afghan Pathans taken\nPOW by USA and incarcerated in Guantanamo Cuba..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Culture is stronger\nthan life and stronger than death. culture triumphs over death and offers man\neternal life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-77njCF7xfco/UGN9Pcug-5I/AAAAAAAATcM/XVgvJOO_Ogw/s1600/fffrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-77njCF7xfco/UGN9Pcug-5I/AAAAAAAATcM/XVgvJOO_Ogw/s320/fffrr.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wife lending among the\neskimo might be practiced as a gesture of hospitality, a way of cementing a\nfriendship and promoting brotherhood in a unforgiving and dangerous\nenvironment, and thus may acquire the status of a high moral value. This is for\nsurvival.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cultures themselves\nmust NEVER EVER be evaluated or graded as higher and lower, superior or\ninferior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A culture is a time\ntested means to an end-- the culture ( or way of life ) of the more highly\ndeveloped nation is \u201cimposed\u201d upon the less developed peoples .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now-a-days it is\nfashion -- to use word culture mindlessly like corporate culture, computer\nculture, or alien culture , -- here it is CULTURAL --- not culture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In anthropology and\nsociology we apply culture clashes, culture shock, and counter- culture (like\neating from same plate--)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a nutshell --\nRESPECT CULTURE\u2014don\u2019t ridicule culture\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Next time your\nprofessor teaches you something in college which you do NOT agree with or sound like bull to you , speak\nup. &nbsp;99.99% of the time the teacher will NOT be able to explain , as he himself\nis a brainwashed zombie, belonging to the group who is trained to holler\n\"4 legs good 2 legs better\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First of all imagine\nthat you are a group of boy scouts. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>TERRAIN MUST PREVAIL OVER THE MAP, ALWAYS.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The science of\neconomics is gone once you get past the supply and demand curve. Most\neverything after that is ideological, and therefore not science.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economists routinely\npredict when the market needs a correction, and they do. &nbsp;Most of the time it is like filling up ballast\non the wrong side of the ship causing it to capsize. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ea9LrzFnyqE/U3i7TgsQq4I/AAAAAAAAsTU/ohAHap-yQ64/s1600/_57911921_codddecordia.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ea9LrzFnyqE/U3i7TgsQq4I/AAAAAAAAsTU/ohAHap-yQ64/s1600/_57911921_codddecordia.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, such a correction can cause a usual list\nof the ship . &nbsp;&nbsp;But It does the reverse\nfor an \u201cANGLE OF LOLL \u201c . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perception is\nrequires to find out of the GM ( metacentric height ) is positive or negative. &nbsp;&nbsp;Metacentric\nheight is the distance between the centre of gravity of a ship and its metacenter..\nMetacentre is determined by the ratio between the inertia resistance of the\nboat and the volume of the ship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a DOMINO EFFECT\nfactor\u2014which causes market crashes and FALSE booms .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">DOMINO EFFECT IN CHANGE\nMANAGEMENT VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mlcfloXoSno/U3i7YlpEReI/AAAAAAAAsTc/FPciZl3pGtE/s1600/lhuuyfvsssvvhj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mlcfloXoSno/U3i7YlpEReI/AAAAAAAAsTc/FPciZl3pGtE/s1600/lhuuyfvsssvvhj.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economists routinely\npredict when the market needs a correction, and they do. The problem is that\nthere is a lot of \"pseudoscience\" in economics where observations and\nstatistics are manipulated to support conclusions or theories based on\npolitical agendas, and the FAKE reputation of the economist , which muddies the\nwaters in finding what is accurate and what is not.</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Economics is an&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">empirical</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;pseudo science where the reverse happens, more often than not.<o:p></o:p></span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bullsh#t phrases like \"rising\ntide\" and \"trickle down\" effect and percentages which economists\nmouth on TV , sometimes even to impress a good looking TV anchor is NOT even\nreal. &nbsp;&nbsp;Neoclassical Economics, has zilch\npredictive power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Axiomatic systems ( proof\n) are not bounded by correspondence with reality, and theoretic systems (truth\n) are not bounded by our understanding of causes. &nbsp;Mathematics can describe all of the universe,\nthe universe cannot describe all of mathematics. &nbsp;Axiomatic systems are not bounded by correspondence\nwith reality, while theoretic systems are bounded by correspondence with\nreality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
