History was fudged. It is so easy when you control the peer reviewed\nmedia and publishing houses. This is why you get the truth on Internet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Early in 1756, Siraj Ud\nDaulah had succeeded his grandfather Alivardi Khan as Nawab of Bengal. Siraj Ud\nDaula was killed before even a single shot was fired by his brother-in-law and\narmy Commander Mir Jaffar, who was bribed by Rothschild employee Robert Clive.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Az90tYpjyc4/UGFhz4_Pm_I/AAAAAAAATCQ/ON87vrOCcO8/s1600/ERTUI.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"318\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Az90tYpjyc4/UGFhz4_Pm_I/AAAAAAAATCQ/ON87vrOCcO8/s400/ERTUI.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mir Jaffar was made a\nstooge Nawab and in return he gave a lot of Siraj Ud Daula's gold and diamonds\nfor Robert Clive to take home personally in great secrecy. Clive wanted to\nsqueeze him more and when unable to milk him further, shoved off Mir Jaffar and\nput his rival Mir Qasim as the Satrap.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adam Smith ( born 5\nJune 1723 \u2013 died 17 July 1790) took ten years to write his economics gospel by\nway of a book \u201cThe Wealth of Nations \u201c , publishing it in 1776. .&nbsp; He never married, and he used to walk like a\nCHAKKA.&nbsp; He was delusional too,&nbsp; sometimes in a morbid manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is also said to have\nput bread and butter into a teapot, drunk the concoction, upped his ante and\nmade a hue and cry over the quality of tea . Another time our man Adam Smith\nwithout as much as a \u201cby your leave\u201d&nbsp; went\nout sleep walking in his nightgown in broad daylight and ended up 24 km outside\nof town, before nearby church bells brought him back to reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His house used to look\nlike a garbage dump as he hoarded everything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much later in 1799,\nR0thschild would murder Tipu Sultan , and then make a huge pretense of a great\nwar. By now Adam Smith was dead and gone. But the blue print was his alone.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The door of Tipu\u2019s fort\nwere opened by Mir Sadeeq on 4th May 1799. . All Tipu Sultan loyalists soldiers\nwere sent away to stand in queue for wage distribution. <span style=\"color: blue;\">Tipu Sultan was having\nhis food, when he was killed by a single shot from close quarters on his left\ncheek</span>. He was also stabbed three times on his chest and later dumped outside on\nthe field among the dead at dusk&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3JS3ZII05Hw/UGFkK9uNbdI/AAAAAAAATCg/-09PeB_5iPc/s1600/bodyoftipusultan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3JS3ZII05Hw/UGFkK9uNbdI/AAAAAAAATCg/-09PeB_5iPc/s640/bodyoftipusultan.jpg\" width=\"496\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mir Sadiq and his\nassistant Mir Moinuddin , who were bribed by R0thschild man Lord Wellesely,\nwere both murdered by the British and made it appear as if they were killed by\nTipu Sultan loyalists.&nbsp; So the British\nmade ousted King Wodeyar, rotting in Tipu's prison , the new king of Mysore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">R0thschild is like\nPhantom, The Ghost who walks. When one Phantom dies the son takes over the\nempire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">R0thschild&nbsp; took away Tipu Sultan's gold worth Trillions,\nin 3 ships which were waiting for months to carry it away. This is the base\nbanking capital of Nathan Rothschild.</span> This gold was stolen from the Kerala\ntemples by Tipu Sultan ,the fruit of 6 millenniums of spice trade.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am from\nKerala.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pBsNIcmtsTA/UGFiauy7mEI/AAAAAAAATCY/GGxXiPDuypQ/s1600/imagesCA3PUK9Q.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"232\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pBsNIcmtsTA/UGFiauy7mEI/AAAAAAAATCY/GGxXiPDuypQ/s400/imagesCA3PUK9Q.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a minor south Kerala Sri Padmanabhaswamy temple 25 billion US\ndollars worth gold was unearthed in July 2011. The main vaults are yet to be\nopened due to security issues and a judicial order. Tipu Sultan was left alone\nby Rothschild till be made a huge pile of gold by plundering the temples of\nKerala, using his half Arab half Malayali Muslim spies.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-B-eK_xRzaLs/UGFkP4PtAdI/AAAAAAAATCo/_KXNCwszQ7w/s1600/imagesCASLVVHN.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"170\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-B-eK_xRzaLs/UGFkP4PtAdI/AAAAAAAATCo/_KXNCwszQ7w/s320/imagesCASLVVHN.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much later Winston\nChurchill , whose mother Jenny Jerome was Rothschild, would use the Adam Smith\nmodel to start both World Wars, to carve out the state of Israel. He used used\nLusitania ( sister ship of Titanic ) to drag America into the war in WW1 and\nPearl Harbour in WW2. Today Rothschilds owns most of Israel<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back to the\nfather of Economics-- Adam Smith had OCD or obsessive compulsive disorder.\nHoarding is an effort to manage the anxiety raised by obsessive doubts.&nbsp; There will be&nbsp;\na disruption to feelings of self-worth, interpersonal relationships,\noccupation, or health as a result of hoarding items which are worthless.. A\nhoarder will have an imaginary emotional connection to all such garbage. People\nwith personality disorders , generally, blame others for their problems. They\nare awful to work with because they don\u2019t accept responsibility for themselves\nand therefore never change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When such people write\nthe gospel of economics, \" The Weath Of Nations\" you know what you\nwill get.&nbsp; Much later Milton Friedman\neffectively took many of the basic principles set forth by Adam Smith and the\nclassical economists and modernized them.&nbsp;\nThis is the reason why economists fall into the same hole again and again\nand again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The heavy part comes\nnow-- let me crack a quintessential&nbsp;\n\"Economist \" joke, to cheer you up. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These dorks are so full\nof themselves .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Experienced economist\nand not so experienced economist are walking down Oxford street.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They get across shit\nlying on the asphalt.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Experienced economist:\n\"If you eat it I'll give you $20,000!\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Not so experienced\neconomist runs his optimization program on his I7 procesor laptop and figures\nout he's better off eating it so he does and collects money.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Continuing along the\nsame road they almost step into yet another pice of turd.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The not so experienced\neconomist: \"Now, if YOU eat this shit I'll give YOU $20,000.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>After evaluating the\nproposal , our experienced economist eats shit and pockets the moolah.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They go on.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The not so experienced\neconomist starts thinking aloud : \"Listen, we both have the same amount of\nmoney we had before, but we both ate shit. I don't see us being better\noff.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Experienced economist:\n\"Well, that's true, but you overlooked the fact that we've been just\ninvolved in $40,000 of fucking trade.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take a break -- come\nback and try and understand what I say.&nbsp;\nI am a perceptive ship Captain. I really don't care for mother hen's\nopinion as to how good the omelette on my breakfast plate is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me digress and\ngive you an brief introduction to the great American Depression of 1924. This\nis one of the holes I talked about before when all economists fell face down .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The international\nbankers mentored by Rothschild installed a Central Bank in 1913\u2026The Federal\nReserve. And as long as this institution exists, perpetual debt is guaranteed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfortunately,\neconomics is often viewed with confusion and boredom. Endless streams of\nfinancial jargon coupled with intimidating empirical mathematics quickly baffle\nand deter people from attempts at understanding it. However, the fact is, the\ncomplexity associated with the financial system is a mere mask, designed to\nconceal one of the most socially paralyzing structures humanity has ever\nendured.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every single dollar in\nyour wallet is owed to somebody by somebody; for remember, the only way the\nmoney can come into existence is from loans. Therefore, if everyone in the\ncountry were able to pay off all debts, including the government, there would\nnot be one dollar in circulation. If there were no debts in Adam Smith modeled\nUS money system, there wouldn`t be any money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, so far we have\ndiscussed the reality that money is created out of debt, through loans. These\nloans are based on a bank\u2019s \u201cReserves\u201d and Reserves are derived from deposits.\nThrough this fractional reserve system, any one deposit can create 9 times its\noriginal value, in turn debasing the existing money supply, raising prices in\nsociety. And since all this money is created out of debt and circulated\nrandomly through commerce, people become detached from their original debt and\na disequilibrium exists where people are forced to compete for labor, in order\nto pull enough money out of the money supply to cover their costs of living.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As dysfunctional and\nbackwards as all of this might seem\u2026 there is still one thing we have omitted\nfrom this equation\u2026 and it is this element of the structure which reveals the\ntruly fraudulent nature of the system itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;-The application of Interest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the government\nborrows money from the Fed or when person borrows money from a bank, it almost\nalways has to be paid back with accrued interest. In other words, almost every\nsingle dollar that exists must be eventually returned to a bank, with interest\npaid as well. But, if all money is borrowed from the central bank and is\nexpanded by the commercial banks through loans, only what would be referred to\nas the \u2018principle\u2019 is being created in the money supply\u2026. So then, where is the\nmoney to cover all of the interest that is charged?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nowhere. It doesn\u2019t\nexist. The ramifications of this are staggering, for the amount of money owed\nback to the banks will always exceed the amount of money that is available in\ncirculation. This is why Inflation is a constant in the economy, for new money\nis always needed to help cover the perpetual deficit built into the system,\ncaused by the the need to pay the interest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">There are two ways to conquer and enslave a\nnation. One is by the sword. The other is by debt.-John Adams-1735-1826).</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OOPS I went of tangent\n--let me get back to the Great American Depression of 1924.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nineteen twenties\nwas a period of great prosperity in the United States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The financial jackals\ndecided that it is the right time to pull the rug from the feet of the\ngullible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schemes were laid down\nwhere by paying a small amount , you could buy almost anything , provided you\ngive a monthly recurring payment--or in short put the common man in the vice of\ndebt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gullible common\nYank had NO dang idea , of the dangers of debt and high interest rates --&nbsp; and kept shopping merrily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advertising became part\nof the fabric of American culture as ads dominated newspapers and\nmagazines--about huge discounts and hassle free loans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keeping up with the\nJoneses , social snobbery and false studies convinced consumers to buy more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With massive corporate\ngrowth, high employment and a post-war bull-market on Wall Street, first time\nAmerican investors went on a stock-market buying spree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everyone wanted a piece\nof this cake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People bought stock on\nmargin or credit for as little as 10% down. They then used the stock as\ncollateral to borrow more money to buy more stock. Then they did it again. The\nmarket was a free-for-all. It was prosperity heaven.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although everything\nlooked rosy, it was a castle made of sand and the great American party ended on\nOctober 29th 1929 when the stock market crashed and caught everyone off guard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everyone except the Jew\nRothschild money bag insiders and their financial jackals --that is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April of 1929, Paul\nWarburg, the father of the Fed, sent out a secret advisory warning his friends\nthat a collapse and nationwide depression was certain, then in August of 1929\nthe Fed began to tighten money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Huge financial Wall\nStreet giants were forewarned in secret of the incoming tsunami .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John D. Rockefeller, J.P.\nMorgan, Bernard Beruch and all the Free Masons ( read as the old Opium running\npartners of Rothschild family) got out of the stock market just before the\ncrash and put all their assets in cash or gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On October 24th, 1929,\nthe big NY bankers called in their 24-hour broker call loans. This meant that\nboth stockbrokers and customers had to dump their stocks on the market to cover\ntheir loans, no matter what price they had to sell them for. As a result, the\nmarket tumbled and that day was known as \"Black Thursday\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Curtis Dall, a broker\nfor Lehman brothers, was on the floor of the NY stock exchange the day of the\ncrash.&nbsp; In his 1970 book, \"FDR: my\nexploited father in law\", he explained that the crash was triggered by the\nplanned sudden shortage of call money in the NY money market.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within a few weeks, $3\nbillion vanished into thin air. Within a year, $40 billion vanished.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But did it really\ndisappear?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or was it simply netted\nby the financial jackals?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And what did the Fed\ndo? Instead of moving to help the economy out, by quickly lowering interest\nrates to stimulate the economy, the Fed continued to brutally contract the\nmoney supply further, deepening the depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Between 1929 and 1933,\nthe Fed reduced the money supply by an additional 33%. The Federal reserve\nengineered the great Depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the money lost by\nthe common Yank during the depression, didn't just vanish. It was lined the\nnests of the jackals who had gotten out just before the crash and had purchased\ngold, which is always a safe place to put your money just before a depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the crash the\ngreat depression put 1/3 of the US workforce out of work.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OtYVeUX-Gms/UGFhieM4zRI/AAAAAAAATCA/WG-_90OvXw4/s1600/images+(4).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OtYVeUX-Gms/UGFhieM4zRI/AAAAAAAATCA/WG-_90OvXw4/s400/images+(4).jpg\" width=\"508\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The banks foreclosed on\nproperty and took possession of peoples' homes and farms. When panicked\ncitizens lined-up at banks to withdraw their hard earned savings, the banks\ngave them only 10c on the dollar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Homeless and desperate,\nmany Americans set up tent cities and roamed the rails looking for work.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Pz-ZP9uZOq4/UGFhqGUYLXI/AAAAAAAATCI/hdQiWbWPRTs/s1600/images+(6).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Pz-ZP9uZOq4/UGFhqGUYLXI/AAAAAAAATCI/hdQiWbWPRTs/s640/images+(6).jpg\" width=\"492\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Congressman Louis McFadden, chairman of the\nHouse Banking Committee, claimed the crash was planned by the international\nbankers who sought to become rulers of us all. In his famous 1932 Congressional\naddress he said \"Mr. Chairman, we have in this country one of the most\ncorrupt institutions the world has ever known. I refer to the Federal Reserve\nBoard and the Federal Reserve banks. The Federal Reserve Board has cheated the\npeople of the United States out of enough money to pay the national debt 3\ntimes over. This evil institution has impoverished and ruined the people of the\nUnited States through the defects of the law in which it operates and through\nthe corrupt practices of the moneyed vultures who control it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The common Yank thinks\nthe Federal Reserve Banks are government institutions. They are not government\ninstitutions; they are private credit monopolies which prey upon the people of\nthe United States for the benefit of themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following a series of\ndeath threats, McFadden was finally poisoned and done in by the jackals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Murder-- yes-- you are\ndealing with ex-drug runners and slave traders, right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economics has done a\npoor job of understanding the economy,&nbsp;\nas demonstrated by the failure of metrics,&nbsp; statistical collection of data ,&nbsp; academic monitoring . Not a single Economical\nScience expert out of millions could predict the 2008 recession, despite indications\nto the contrary. Economics fails because it can only understand the economy in\nabstract terms, and so it is seen clearly.&nbsp;\nEconomics appears to primarily study large corporations and small\nbusinesses with the catchall term of \u201cfirms.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I can see that you are\npretty depressed by now--let me tell you another joke, while you have your\ncoffee.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For what follows after the joke\nwill be pretty depressing and you will get terribly angry at the <span style=\"color: blue;\">WAYS OF THE\nPIED PIPER. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">An American banker\nneeds to go for a crap , and so he stops at the best motel in town in&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Oklahoma</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>He tells the motel\nowner at the reception that he needs to stay overnight, but he has to check out\nthe best room first, and only if it suits his standards, only then , he will\nstay overnight.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The owner agrees, takes\n100 dollars from him as a refundable deposit, and the traveller goes up to\ncheck out his room.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Meanwhile the motel\nowner races to the town\u2019s resident whore and returns the 100 dollars he owes\nher. The whore rushes to the tailor and return 100 dollars she owes him. The\ntailor rushes to the butcher, the butcher rushes to the tavern owner etc\netc\u2014this 100 dollar changes hands several times , before the 100 dollar bill\ncomes back to the motel owner via the local blacksmith who had used the motel\nseveral times.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The traveller meanwhile\ndeclares that the motel room is below his standards, ( but he used the toilet\nfor a nice crap quietly ) collects his 100 dollars back from the motel owner ,\ngets into his car and drives away. Now\u2014<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Every body has\nbenefitted\u2014the traveller had his free crap at leisure, the entire town have\nrepayed their debts in a MERRY GO ROUND WAY , and is looking forwards to a\nbetter future with renewed confidence.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This is how the\nAmerican system works.</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4toJoHqmd3U/UGFhXlRnvII/AAAAAAAATB4/3pC2GgKPsss/s1600/images+(59).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"372\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4toJoHqmd3U/UGFhXlRnvII/AAAAAAAATB4/3pC2GgKPsss/s400/images+(59).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since 99% of my readers\nare NOT economists , I must give them a brief run down of what this pseudo\nscience is all about.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adam Smith (1776)\ndefined what was then called political economy as \"an inquiry into the\nnature and causes of the wealth of nations\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economics is a study of\nman in the ordinary business of life. It enquires how he gets his income and\nhow he uses it.&nbsp; It is a science which\nstudies human behaviour as a relationship between ends and ze scarce means .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economics is the social\nscience that analyzes the production, distribution, and consumption of goods\nand services.&nbsp; Positive economics\n(describing \"what is\"), normative economics (advocating \"what\nought to be\") , Mainstream economics (more \"orthodox\" and\ndealing with the \"rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus\") and\nHeterodox economics (more \"radical\" and dealing with the\n\"institutions-history-social structure nexus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economists use gross\ndomestic product (GDP) to keep track of how an economy is doing, which is a\nflawed way. GDP measures the value of all final goods and services produced in\nan economy in a given period of time, usually a quarter or a year.&nbsp;&nbsp; So a recession occurs when GDP is\ndecreasing.&nbsp; A boom occurs when GDP is\nincreasing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The assessment of\neconomic growth based on Gross Domestic Product is a fallacy, because GDP is\nmerely a measure of the amount of money in an economy. The one thing it does\nnot measure, which is central to economic progress (note progress, not growth),\nis the level of entrepreneurial activity in a country like India.&nbsp; Don\u2019t believe me , just take a flight to\nCoimbatore or Ludhiana . This has important implications for the efficacy of\ngovernment interventions and solutions to the current economic crisis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On a ship I judge an\nofficer by his future potential. NOT by what he did in the past. At sea we look\nahead and we do NOT look too much into the rear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GDP is basically the\nsum total of recorded business activity at the consumption level plus\ngovernment spending expressed in money terms.&nbsp;\nIf the government spends more, GDP rises; give more money to consumers,\nGDP rises; give more bank credit to consumers or business, GDP rises.&nbsp; Cut government spending, GDP falls. This is\nnot contentious and has nothing to do with economic progress.&nbsp; Importantly, it excludes future entrepreneurial\nactivity, except to the extent that an entrepreneur has actually spent some\nmoney putting his future plans into action. The obsession with GDP means that\nentrepreneurial activity, which is Adam Smith\u2019s unseen hand that guides our\nfuture, is invisible to economic planners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Misleading statistics\nsuch as GDP are leading all governments into bad policy decisions, and their\nchoice has narrowed down to either ever-greater reflationary attempts to pump\nup GDP, or alternatively facing a collapse in the GDP number as bank credit\ncontracts.. The twin errors of misunderstanding GDP are the failure to see that\nmonetary inflation is concealing a deepening economic depression,&nbsp; and it encourages policies that destroy\nentrepreneurial activity, or economic progress itself.&nbsp; This is a deadly combination, the equivalent\nof being in a hole and continuing to dig.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot expect\npoliticians to stop digging deeper and faster when their economic advisers are\ncalling for more shovels. All politicians are fully committed to the fallacies\nthat result from confusing GDP with economic progress. They pursue economic\npolicies that are the equivalent of eating their own children.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microeconomics is\ngenerally the study of individuals and business decisions,&nbsp; while macroeconomics looks at higher up\ncountry and government decisions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microeconomics focuses\non supply and demand and other forces that determine the price levels seen in\nthe economy.&nbsp; It examines the behavior of\nbasic elements in the economy, including individual agents (such as households\nand firms or as buyers and sellers) and markets, and their interactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Macroeconomics does not\nadhere to a valid scientific method and supporting evidence cannot be\nsufficiently provided as there are so many factors which are totally ignored.\nMost theories lack any plausibility This is the field of economics that studies\nthe behavior of the economy as a whole , entire industries and economies. This\nlooks at economy-wide phenomena, such as Gross National Product (GDP) and how\nit is affected by changes in unemployment, national income, rate of growth, and\nprice levels.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Macroeconomics would\nlook at how an increase/decrease in net exports would affect a nation's capital\naccount or how GDP would be affected by unemployment rate. Macroeconomics\nanalyzes the entire economy and issues affecting it, including unemployment,\ninflation, economic growth, and monetary and fiscal policy.&nbsp; It examines the economy as a whole to explain\nbroad aggregates and their interactions \"top down\", that is, using a\nsimplified form of general-equilibrium theory.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such aggregates include\nnational income and output, the unemployment rate, and price inflation and\nsubaggregates like total consumption and investment spending and their\ncomponents. It also studies effects of monetary policy and fiscal policy.\nMacroeconomic analysis also considers factors affecting the long-term level and\ngrowth of national income. Such factors include capital accumulation,\ntechnological change and labor force growth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The microeconomics upon\nwhich modern macro has now been founded is indeed bull&nbsp; but if we do the micro right, then we can\ncome up with non-bull&nbsp; macro.&nbsp; When the computer takes in Micro crap, the\noutput Macro crap will still be crap.. Maybe we can come up with slightly\nbetter macro than what we\u2019ve got now, but the underlying micro is never gonna\nto be right. Economics is haunted by more fallacies than any other study known\nto man. Probably Economics must be taught about culture and human behavior,\nthere can be no generalisation here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bottom line is that\nmicroeconomics takes a bottoms-up approach to analyzing the economy while\nmacroeconomics takes a top-down approach.&nbsp;\nWe must shove in food through the right orifice and excrete it from the\nright orifice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern economics has\ndegenerated into a vulgar pseudo-science.&nbsp;\nEconomists could no more explain periodic trade depressions than to\npredict them.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Economics is so fundamentally disconnected from\nthe real world we live in , it is downright destructive.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Economics is a pseudo-science and economists\nare its alchemists.&nbsp; The rating agencies\nare just the mob muscle for the financial companies. In case a Rothschild bank\nneeds to squeeze the ba##s of&nbsp; a\n\"client\"&nbsp; just get the \u201cpet\ndog\u201d rating agency to threaten to downgrade a little bit. We live in the age of\nthe economic engineer, where everything means nothing and nothing means\neverything.&nbsp; Pick a number, any number,\nand do what you like to it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wrong-headed economics was\nthe cause of the financial crisis. It has brought us a mountain of debt.&nbsp; It has encouraged us to waste the world\u2019s\nresources without much thought for the consequences.&nbsp; It is behind the rise in individualism and\nthe weakening of many democratic principles.&nbsp;\nIt has warped our ideas of charity, social responsibility and progress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need to ditch many\nmodern economic ideas. Notions about the free market, competition, regulation\nand trade need to be reconsidered. We need a different measure of progress. We\nneed to put ourselves, our societies, back at the core of what we want to\nachieve. Modern economics has fallen short. It has widened the gap between rich\nand poor. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has not allocated\nthe world's resources fairly. It has brought the West to the brink of financial\nruin. It has placed short-term gain before long-term progress. And it has made\nus focus on the individual, not the society. The end result is a worldwide\nfinancial crisis of epic proportions and a planet being scraped clean of the\nresources needed by future generations, and things are only getting worse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The authorities could\nno longer calculate the risks and started relying on the risk management\nmethods of the greedy banks themselves-- or to be more precise highly paid\nbakers covering their&nbsp; own asses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A pseudoscience is&nbsp; presented as scientific, , it lacks\nsupporting evidence and&nbsp; cannot be\nreliably tested. Due to the sheer scale and complexity of national, regional\nand global economies, no macroeconomic theories can be reliably tested. The\neconomy is so complex that macroeconomists massively simplify it in order to\ntry and make some data fit their theories.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economic models are almost totally\nuseless, as there are trillions of factors which affect the economy constantly.\nThis is like calculating the Shear forces and bending moments of a complex ship\nmeant to ply stormy oceans , using a rectangular barge in still harbor waters.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economics contain quite\ncomplicated Calculus and Math equations that just happens to have little or\nnothing to do with what it's supposed to prove. To suggest economies were not\ngenerally efficient would&nbsp; be heresy in\nmany classes. You see Amatya Sen\u2019s wife Emma is now glorifying Adam Smith.\nAfter all he was a servant of her family.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian Nobel prize\nwinner , Amartya Sen's third wife is Emma Rothschild, who is the direct blood\nsister of Amschel Mayor James Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Bengalis who were NOT\nplaying ball and resisting Opium cultivation in their fertile fields were\nforbidden to plant rice. This was on Adam Smith\u2019s advise to Warren hastings.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; That does not deny in\nany way the need for state action to supplement the operations of the market by\ncreating jobs and incomes (e.g., through work programs). If unemployment were\nto increase sharply thanks to bad economic circumstances or bad public policy,\nthe market would not, on its own, recreate the incomes of those who have lost\ntheir jobs. The new unemployed, Smith wrote, \"would either starve, or be\ndriven to seek a subsistence either by begging, or by the perpetration perhaps\nof the greatest enormities,\" and \"want, famine, and mortality would\nimmediately prevail....\" UNQUOTE-- &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLAH BLAH BLAH\u2014</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By all this jargon,he\nmeant to say in plain language\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1) There was adequate\nfood in Bengal at the time of the great famine in 1943.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2) There was NO need\nfor Churchill to send rice to India .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3) Diverting grain\nships from Australia passing India enroute to Suez Canal every few days, was\nNOT necessary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4) Bengalis did panic\nbuying and greedy hoarding in a disgraceful manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5) The local\nadministration consisting of mainly Bengalis were corrupt and inefficient in\nfood distribution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6) How incompetence and\ncorruption can cause famine in a land of plenty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7) Root cause of famine\nwas inflation and speculative hoarding by Bengalis. It was NOT hoarded by\nBritish for the army.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8) Food was stocked 13%\nmore in Bengal than in 1943 than in 1941. Hence it was OK for Churchill to\nexport food from India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9) Famine cannot exist\nin proper democracy. ( India under princely states never had famine )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10) 1943 famine was a\nlocal Bengali man made thing. The incompetence was native NOT of the British.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11) Bengali producers\nexported food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12) Wages of labourers\nwas NOT in par with food prices. Enough food was there , believe me, I saw it\nin the local bania godowns .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Am#rya Sen baffle you\nwith human rights, poverty, inequality , welfare economics , social choice\ntheory , democracy to prevent famine, food distribution systems , FAD,\nentitlement theory, third degree shortage in a under nourished society,\nmisdirected policies, negative freedom, positive freedom ( sic!) , entitlement\nshifts -- BLAH BLAH.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now\u2014<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let us imagine a boy\nking of 12 is in charge of a kingdom threatened by famine -- &nbsp;as it has happened so many times in our\nhistory.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He knows that even\nNapoleon cannot eat thrice the amount of rice (or staple food like potato) he\nnormally eats -- we are NOT talking about caviar here.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He will know that all\navailable food has to be immediately secured or siezed , by strict\nmonitoring.&nbsp; He will make hoarding a\ndeath penalty.&nbsp; For this he does NOT have\nto search the whole country, where 95% people are hand to mouth --\"there\ngoes one more day\" pattern.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He will prohibit any\nfamily from having more than a week of food stock in their houses.&nbsp;&nbsp; He will introduce a fair price rationing\nsystem for people below the poverty line.&nbsp;\nWhen it comes to the crunch he will give a royal order that only the\nking's depots&nbsp; can sell rice.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He will make sure\nepidemics are controlled , by advocating alternate foods , instead of rice\n--&nbsp; as usually 60% of famine deaths are\nby malnutrition related diseases. He will eliminate waste. He will d his level\nbest to import food.&nbsp; He will leave no\nstone unturned to run survival kitchens. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is not gonna be\nconstrained by bullshit modern economist theories -- where just mere earthy\ncommonsense is required.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">He needs no Adam fu#kin\u2019 Smith theory, to save his people.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as Amartya Sen\nwon the Nobel prize in 1998 for Economic sciences 10.4 lakh Bengalis delirious\nwith joy had taken out a rally on the streets of Calcutta, dancing for hours. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His R0thschild wife Emma rewarded him for white washing the war crime of her\nown family R0thschild and Winston Churchill . Amartya Sen's third wife is Emma\nR0thschild, is the direct blood sister of Amschel Mayor James Rothschild. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bengalis were\nprohibited to plant food and all their boats . Even bullock carts and elephants\nwere confiscated, as a scorched earth policy( sic!) against Jap\ninvaders.Starving skeletoned people in a terribly shocking condition started\npouring into Calcutta, by the millions . They would forage , fight over scraps\n, and eat any sort of garbage .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OHTnpI8ESMc/UGFhQGzgFpI/AAAAAAAATBw/PLiuX8d5vMk/s1600/SSS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"245\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OHTnpI8ESMc/UGFhQGzgFpI/AAAAAAAATBw/PLiuX8d5vMk/s320/SSS.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ibTR5PnsvGo/UGFkef5SIYI/AAAAAAAATC4/yeg5-BQD1OQ/s1600/DRYU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ibTR5PnsvGo/UGFkef5SIYI/AAAAAAAATC4/yeg5-BQD1OQ/s400/DRYU.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adam Smith was\nresponsible for the Chinese Opium misery. It was his idea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His theory was-- EVERY\nMAN IS ALLOWED TO PURSUE HIS HEDONISTIC DESIRES TO A LAWFUL CONCLUSION, AND\nTHAT OPIUM IS A \"LEGITIMATE PRODUCT\" . ( If you want to know what is\nHedonism , go to Negril Jamaica , and check out drugged orgies on the open\nbeach in broad daylight -- own pleasure first ! screw everybody else !!)&nbsp; ALL OBSTACLES TO BUYING CHEAP AND SELLING\nDEAR MUST BE REMOVED, WHICH IS THE CORE OF GLOBALISATION...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emma R0thschild's has\nalso done a good job of white washing&nbsp;\nhedonist and East India company employee, Adam Smith vide her book\nECONOMIC SENTIMENTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k7FwWdNVsAc/UGGKYw-vfqI/AAAAAAAATFs/i13oZpG9JEA/s1600/richard+cantillon.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k7FwWdNVsAc/UGGKYw-vfqI/AAAAAAAATFs/i13oZpG9JEA/s320/richard+cantillon.jpg\" width=\"239\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSorry Emma--here is one in the eye for you, below -- ( above picture is of <span style=\"color: red;\">Richard Cantillon</span> )&nbsp;</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adam Smith's brilliance cannot be questioned with economists around you,unless you want to be insulted. n. Any errors he made were excused as the\ninevitable flaws of any great IQ absent minded professor.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Adam Smith ties' were\nworn as a badge of honour in the upper echelons of the Reagan Administration. Nobody would wear a Hitler tie, right?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marxists, hail Adam Smith as the ultimate inspiration of their own Founding\nFather, German Jew Karl Marx, who was related to Rothschild.. Indeed, if the\naverage person were asked to name two economists in history whom he has heard\nof, Smith and Marx would probably be the runaway winners of the poll.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adam Smith originated nothing that was true, and &nbsp;whatever he originated was bull. Adam\nSmith was a shameless plagiarist, from the works of Richard Cantillon. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you seen our own\nmediocre economist Amartya Sen lisp the word \u201cmodel\u201d in every third sentence ?&nbsp; &nbsp;He\nwants to stand out as a brilliant guy of the Adam Smith school, which is so\ndear to his Rothschild wife ( third one )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern economics is\nobsessed with modelling. &nbsp;If an economist\ndoes NOT say the world model or even hear it, he will go crazy with withdrawal\nsymptoms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is a model?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Models &nbsp;describe a situation, and describe how that\nsituation would be changed by a given set of event\u2014demand and supply. A\nmathematical model as a predictive tool to demonstrate the outcome of events in\nthis complex world run by human emotions \u2014 is for the gullible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economists are\npretenders who use formal mathematical techniques to understand, and hold your\nbreath - accurately predict the result of changes in the economy . &nbsp;The truth is that these stupid models can\nnever &nbsp;accurately predict the future. &nbsp;When you fire a gun you know where the bullet\nwill make a hole. But hey, our modern economists baffle you with bull, that\nthey can accurately model the trajectories of prices, employment and interest\nrates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An economist with mediocre\nbrains ( otherwise he would be a rocket scientist ) pretends to be a master of\nall trades - &nbsp;philosophers, social\nengineers, historians, sooth sayers, mathematicians, statisticians,\npolitical scientists, sociologists and psychologists, among many other things. &nbsp;The math equation is difficult to comprehend ,\nas it is nonsense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet economics \u2014 and\neconomic decisions, from the macro to the micro level \u2014 is a human subject NOT\nmath. &nbsp;It is subtle and psychological and\nsporadic. A human subject requires human language, human emotion, human\nintuition.
