, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our Prime Minister\nManmohan Singh spoke in favour of \u201cKeynesian fiscal stimuli\u201d ( BLAH BLAH )&nbsp; at the 2008 G-20 Washington summit on\nFinancial Markets and the World Economy, Nov 14\u201315, 2008, in Washington, D.C.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So\npretty soon we have a&nbsp; rapid shift of\nopinion took place among many prominent economists in favour of Keynesian\nstimulus, and, policy makers began announcing major stimulus packages, in hopes\nof heading off the possibility of a global depression.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These morons think that Manmohan Singh is Mensa intelligent. Only we Indians know what\nhe is worth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cmsqgZT5Awc/UkVrRV3qhxI/AAAAAAAAmGM/NJ29tZyhYWI/s1600/ntrtj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cmsqgZT5Awc/UkVrRV3qhxI/AAAAAAAAmGM/NJ29tZyhYWI/s1600/ntrtj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Keynesian economics\nrests fundamentally on the proposition that macroeconomics isn't a morality\nplay \u2013 that depressions are essentially a technical malfunction. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the Great Depression\ndeepened, Keynes famously declared that \"we have magneto trouble\" \u2013\ni.e., the economy's troubles were like those of a car with a small but critical\nproblem in its electrical system, and the job of the economist is to figure out\nhow to repair that technical problem.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It requires a real stupid\nbrain to perceive that an economy can be compared with a machine, when you\ncould tweak things with a pipe wrench.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike a machine, an\neconomy was neither designed by anyone nor built in a factory. &nbsp;There are no plans...no owner's manual...no\nguide to troubleshooting problems...and no website where owners go to talk\nabout the problems they've had and the tricks they've used to fix them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NnlKKR24QcU/Ur5QGsYO8GI/AAAAAAAAovU/dNXxn37_7vU/s1600/imakugvges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"162\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NnlKKR24QcU/Ur5QGsYO8GI/AAAAAAAAovU/dNXxn37_7vU/s400/imakugvges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First, an economy is a\n\u2018complex adaptive system.\u2019 &nbsp;It has lots\nof moving parts, in other words, and each of these parts has information and\ndesires of its own.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The parts have desires\nof their own. You build a machine to accomplish the desires of the designer. An\neconomy, on the other hand, is merely a way for the constituent parts to\nachieve their own ends.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The production of\nwealth should not be tied to its distribution. &nbsp;The former is in the field of \"applied\neconomics\" while the latter belongs to \"social economics\" and is\nlargely a matter of power and politics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assumptions must NOT be\nmade on scanty information. This is how you get financial market depressions.&nbsp; The field of information economics includes\nboth mathematical-economical research and also behavioral economics, akin to\nstudies in behavioral psychology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An economy is not some\nindependent physical process like plate tectonics. It is a collaborative human\nenterprise. BRICS is now all set to upset the immoral applecart of the\nRothschild banking cartel by introducing a new central bank.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since\nthe economy serves a social function, it can not be separated from politics and\nsocial engineering . The early economic thinkers knew this and wrote in terms\nof political economy. Somewhere in the 19th century this concept was lost and immoral\neconomics as propaganda was born.</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mythological beasts known as \u201cfree\nmarkets\u201d appeared. Common sense tells us that free markets have never existed,\nthat it has always been a question of who controls them for whose benefit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Qsja1Vp_2cM/Ur5P66dK6oI/AAAAAAAAovM/2aRUYcb4R8U/s1600/imangfgmutyges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Qsja1Vp_2cM/Ur5P66dK6oI/AAAAAAAAovM/2aRUYcb4R8U/s400/imangfgmutyges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The result of all these\nvulgar lies and confabulations is that society\u2019s purposes, its goods, are\nreplaced by the few greedy banksters who use the political process to steal and\nconcentrate the wealth of the many into their hands. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because economic\nprocesses are agentless and independent, they can claim that their wealth is\njust a natural outcome of these processes. In other words, they stole nothing\nand all their lootings are legitimate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Qsja1Vp_2cM/Ur5P66dK6oI/AAAAAAAAovM/2aRUYcb4R8U/s1600/imangfgmutyges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Qsja1Vp_2cM/Ur5P66dK6oI/AAAAAAAAovM/2aRUYcb4R8U/s1600/imangfgmutyges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Furthermore, any attempt to redistribute\ntheir wealth, society\u2019s resources, back to the many would be the real theft.\nThe people who speak about this theft are jailed or eliminated or raided and\ndecimated by the IRS.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economics is not a set\nof laws but a set of power relations.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An economist is an\npseudo expert who claims to know tomorrow by the things he predicted yesterday\ndidn\u2019t happen today. He is dangerously close to asking the public to treat\neconomics as a religion. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These immoral economists\nhave built themselves into powerful policymakers and advisers, precisely\nbecause they argue that economics is as reliable and predictive a science as\nphysics or chemistry.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stop printing and\nbroadcasting the opinions of economists so frequently. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every time a Rothschild controlled rating\nagency like Fitch or Moody\u2019s or S&amp;P lowers India\u2019s rating don\u2019t behave as\nif you balls have been electrocuted. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-G_yDkr2wtlc/Ur5Pz3V3PYI/AAAAAAAAovE/ejAUYV9gAKE/s1600/imathekjfrges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"238\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-G_yDkr2wtlc/Ur5Pz3V3PYI/AAAAAAAAovE/ejAUYV9gAKE/s320/imathekjfrges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">This\nis the way the waitress turned empress ushered in FDI in multi-brand retail into\nIndia, right? </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These people whom </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">we drove away in 1947 after 800 years of\nslavery have been given a toe hold all over again.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insist that all\npredictions and pronouncements from economists include a full disclosure of the\nassumptions and limitations of the models used.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is high time we\nshortened the leash on the nostrils of these &nbsp;ninnies, and &nbsp;have them up on a single toe</span>.<o:p></o:p><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We must restrain these people\nfrom making a fetish out of mathematics . These pea brained people were never\ngood at Math in high school, and hence chose the bottom of the barrel Economics\nsubject as their career, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">rather than Electronics\nor Computer Science which requires grey matter.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Today\u2019s so called economists are\nthe modern equivalent of medieval churchmen in robes trying to confound and baffle the\nworld by shoving in high school calculus in between the Bible verses.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>REMOVE ECONOMISTS LIKE AMARTYA SEN FROM POLICY MAKING BODIES.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Debts that cannot be\nrepaid will not be repaid.&nbsp; The debt held\nby the US public was approximately 12.01 trillion USD or about 75% of US GDP. &nbsp;Intragovernmental holdings stood at 5.02\ntrillion USD , giving a combined total public debt of 17 trillion USD . &nbsp;&nbsp;5.6\ntrillion USD or approximately 47% of the debt held by the US public was owned\nby foreign investors, the largest of which were the People's Republic of China\nand Japan at just over 1.1 trillion USD each.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a mischief maker\nuses his \u201cpaid up media\u201d and spreads the rumors of the&nbsp; company's&nbsp;\n( or country\u2019s ) bankruptcy,&nbsp;\nwithin no time the investors will withdraw ALL their investments from\nthat company's share and the price of the share will fall down\ndrastically.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those who want to know more\nabout human emotion , punch into Google search-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">DOMINO EFFECT IN CHANGE\nMANAGEMENT &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: xx-large; line-height: 150%;\">TERRAIN MUST PREVAIL OVER&nbsp;</b><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economics is and never\nwill be a science in the same sense as a hard science.&nbsp;&nbsp; Economics isn't a physical science and can't\npretend to contain processes that are governed by laws; not even by theorems.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">e more complicated to overcome some obvious failings to explain human behavior.\n&nbsp;The theories are expanded and made more\ncomplex in an dazzling attempt to include more realism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is is no wonder that\nthese mindless theories eventually become so complex and restrictive that they\nbecome more interesting to economists to show how smart they are, but less\nuseful to the world at large.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RSNBrCJBy6w/UpxdvdAJBUI/AAAAAAAAoA0/DDqhX2kx1WU/s1600/imagihbfes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RSNBrCJBy6w/UpxdvdAJBUI/AAAAAAAAoA0/DDqhX2kx1WU/s400/imagihbfes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without measurement and\nquantifiable assessment, economics becomes just political economy; linked to\npolitics and power, and using words such as \"should\" and\n\"ought\" and \"perhaps\" and \u201cI believe\u201d. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economic models are not\napplicable across all times and situations.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;MS DOS computers do not work in\nthe era of Windows 8 .&nbsp; A model might\n\u201cwork\u201d in one era and in a very specific set of circumstances, but fail in another\nera or in a similar set of circumstances. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Economics must hedge in culture.&nbsp; Culture is not a static set of objects, it is\na constantly shifting interplay of feedback loops.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Macroeconomics is the\nstudy of the overall flow of wealth in the economy at large.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microeconomics\nstudies the individual actions within an economy.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So far so good.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The near-universal use\nof Gross Domestic Product as a measure of economic success, and by implication\nof quality of life, does not even qualify as basic accounting.&nbsp; This is because the GDP measures \u201cactivity\u201d\ninvolving money, but makes no distinction between useful, useless and harmful\nactivity: the cost of cleaning up pollution is added to the GDP.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This would be like a\nshop keeper entering all his transactions (income and costs alike) in the\ncredit column of his ledger, adding them up, and claiming his business is\nbooming. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So a tree fell on the roof of\nyour house splitting it and also broke your effin' leg.&nbsp; &nbsp;And\nyou are doing well as per your accounts ledger , right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is needed of\ncourse is a balance sheet.&nbsp; It would also\nbe helpful to separate economic, social and environmental factors.&nbsp; All of these things are available, but they\nlanguish because politicians ( like our Rothschild economist Manmohan Singh )\nlove the GDP and love to mouth percentages to look wise.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mainstream economists fail,&nbsp; collectively, to point out the falsity of\nusing GDP as a measure of welfare\u2014 for if you do as business college , you will\nNOT pass..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mainstream economics is\nincomplete, grossly misleading and destructive.&nbsp;\nIt reflects the gross ignorance and long-term intellectual isolation nay\nbankruptcy of its practitioners.&nbsp; It uses\na lot of fancy mathematics only to baffle.&nbsp;\nAll this complex math&nbsp; can\u2019t\ndisguise the fact that mainstream economics is not science \u2013 it is pseudo-science.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When GDP is divided\namong a population, it gives a average value for every person. But within a\npopulation, it is common to some have people with higher wealth and welfare and\nsome people with lower welfare.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MQmWAiu2hwY/UsvUoxUsfsI/AAAAAAAAo_U/3T7nuYxy5cc/s1600/dowcrhtrnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"206\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MQmWAiu2hwY/UsvUoxUsfsI/AAAAAAAAo_U/3T7nuYxy5cc/s1600/dowcrhtrnload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By showing an average value for each person, it\nmay be over-valueing or under-valueing an individuals welfare.&nbsp; People can just change their minds and behave\ncompletely differently.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wise people will NOT\nview&nbsp; GDP as a measure of the welfare of\ncitizens Economics was like psychology, a pseudoscience trying to hide that\nfact with intense theoretical hyper elaboration.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And gross domestic product was one of those\nunfortunate measurement concepts, like Freemason Charles Darwin\u2019s evolution theory\n(ridiculously based on his goodie bag of dried up finches) in this modern age\nof DNA, that ought to have been retired long before. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No economist has the\nguts to say that the Emperor is NOT wearing clothes, it just shows the quality\nof their moral fibre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oOnZHs6kHIQ/Upxd5zpLBYI/AAAAAAAAoBE/wGCHQpL-N7E/s1600/imkuytbgjages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oOnZHs6kHIQ/Upxd5zpLBYI/AAAAAAAAoBE/wGCHQpL-N7E/s1600/imkuytbgjages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\nare concepts and phrases popular with crooked politicians because that\nuncertainty gives them power over the ignorant, the uncaring, the desperate and\nthe leaderless.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nis difficult to wake up an economist who is pretending to sleep. He has to be\nkicked awake on a spot where it hurts real bad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below video: What is GDP worth ?</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/QUaJMNtW6GA/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/QUaJMNtW6GA&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/QUaJMNtW6GA&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">So here we go with\nrocking horse shit--</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mNz6qKcPGdw/VfXJmbWGkpI/AAAAAAAA9Mc/pgZCP3qwy6w/s1600/as_rare_as_rockinRg_horse_shit.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microeconomics :--. the\nstudy of small things such as how firms and households operate, the behavior of\nindividuals and firms in making decisions regarding the allocation of limited\nresources-- applies to markets where goods or services are bought and sold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wr-CPcelazE/VfXJIABsfrI/AAAAAAAA9ME/-_ePojae4to/s1600/400_F_47181979_pBVp5ebRNLdhR2zPlnklXbpvqwbE7SLy7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"488\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wr-CPcelazE/VfXJIABsfrI/AAAAAAAA9ME/-_ePojae4to/s640/400_F_47181979_pBVp5ebRNLdhR2zPlnklXbpvqwbE7SLy7.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Macroeconomics:-&nbsp; the study of things such as inflation,\nmonetary policy, and international trade, &nbsp;the performance, structure, behavior, and decision-making\nof an economy as a whole, rather than individual markets\u2014applies to national,\nregional, and global economies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Vn0TZBef3RU/VfXJMzge9sI/AAAAAAAA9MM/TJ22tx_d8Gg/s1600/stock-photo-ERmacroeconomics-or-macro-economics-as-a-concept-74614873.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"414\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Vn0TZBef3RU/VfXJMzge9sI/AAAAAAAA9MM/TJ22tx_d8Gg/s640/stock-photo-ERmacroeconomics-or-macro-economics-as-a-concept-74614873.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Econometrics :&nbsp; the study of e estimates that may be made\nwhen applying statistical methods to social data, &nbsp;application of mathematics, statistical\nmethods, and computer science, to economic data and is described as the branch\nof economics that aims to give empirical content to economic relations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Yi-8cudJXXg/VfXJU2aC07I/AAAAAAAA9MU/RGR3q5w4s2M/s1600/1650140R4-Abstract-word-cloud-for-Econometrics-with-related-tags-and-terms-Stock-Photo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Yi-8cudJXXg/VfXJU2aC07I/AAAAAAAA9MU/RGR3q5w4s2M/s640/1650140R4-Abstract-word-cloud-for-Econometrics-with-related-tags-and-terms-Stock-Photo.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Xc3A4fbGQuA/VfXJ87jQ81I/AAAAAAAA9Ms/jVgtk3KiKfU/s1600/fc%252C550x550%252Cwhite.Gu2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Xc3A4fbGQuA/VfXJ87jQ81I/AAAAAAAA9Ms/jVgtk3KiKfU/s320/fc%252C550x550%252Cwhite.Gu2.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5Ubl3oGYOsE/VfXKSEvPLGI/AAAAAAAA9M0/Fd9jY4r55Ig/s1600/GameTheory_D3disciplines.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5Ubl3oGYOsE/VfXKSEvPLGI/AAAAAAAA9M0/Fd9jY4r55Ig/s400/GameTheory_D3disciplines.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Bjrqma2ZbXE/VfXKeXGDS2I/AAAAAAAA9M8/Vhx7mimZxQs/s1600/downloFad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"285\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Bjrqma2ZbXE/VfXKeXGDS2I/AAAAAAAA9M8/Vhx7mimZxQs/s400/downloFad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-joQ1TArnldo/VfXK8rbTi2I/AAAAAAAA9NE/4uex8kebM3k/s1600/imagRes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-joQ1TArnldo/VfXK8rbTi2I/AAAAAAAA9NE/4uex8kebM3k/s1600/imagRes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BLAH &nbsp;BLAH &nbsp;&nbsp;BLAH !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">Nowadays I get mE kicks\nby listening to pea brained economists after a market crash.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5vdidZ61xNA/VfXM5HCTveI/AAAAAAAA9NQ/N7Gg7-YHSII/s1600/72.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5vdidZ61xNA/VfXM5HCTveI/AAAAAAAA9NQ/N7Gg7-YHSII/s640/72.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GDP purports to measure\neconomic activity while largely divorcing itself from the quality, profitability,\ndepth, breadth, improvement, advancement, and rationalization of goods and\nservices provided.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you build a 1000\nfishing trawlers who have NOT caught a single fish for 5 years ( due to an\ninherent problem ) it nevertheless contributed to GDP. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If GDP purports to\nmeasure economic activity which benefits society, the inclusion of government\nexpenditures is dubious. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GDP is Designed to\nAdvance the Keynesian Agenda. The welfare of a nation can scarcely be inferred\nfrom a measure of national income.&nbsp; Yet\nthe blind usage of GDP persists. That its permanence and persistence only\nserves the Keynesian policies of greater consumer spending, increased\ngovernment expenditures, and larger exports through currency debasement should\nnot be considered coincidental. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfortunately, the\nresulting economic stagnation, debt accumulation, and price inflation are as\ninevitable as they are predictable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GDP is the market value\nof all final goods and services in a given year. As such, it is only an\naccounting identity reflecting the quantity of money in the economy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Transactions reflecting\nboth wealth creation and also economically destructive state spending are\nincluded in GDP without differentiation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GDP has nothing to do\nwith economic progress. It is a flawed statistic that imperfectly summarises\nthe money-value of selected transactions over a given period.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern economic theory\nis a MODEL established by Kenneth Arrow and Gerard Debreu. They started with an\nextremely abstract mathematical model of an economy -- a set of producers,\nconsumers and commodities -- and then built theorems about its properties. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their &nbsp;result was that, under a gamut of conditions,\nthis imaginary economy would possess a unique&nbsp;\nequilibrium, one set of prices that would perfectly match production and\nconsumption. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In mathematical\neconomics, the Arrow\u2013Debreu model suggests that under certain economic\nassumptions (convex preferences, perfect competition, and demand independence&nbsp; BLAH BLAH ) there must be a set of prices\nsuch that aggregate supplies will equal aggregate demands for every commodity\nin the economy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The model is central to\nthe theory of general (economic) equilibrium and it is often used as a general\nreference for other microeconomic models. It is named after Kenneth Arrow,\nG\u00e9rard Debreu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theory is based on\ntwo assumptions:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Firstly, that a\ncompetitive equilibrium exists if each person in the economy possesses some\nquantity of every good available for sale in that market;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secondly, that\nexploitable labour resources exist which are capable of being used in the\nproduction of desired goods/services.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ASSUMPTIONS SHALL NOT\nBE BASED ON SCANTY INFORMATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The economist\nspecialist is, in the truest sense, an idiot\u2014nay \u2013 an asshole \"</i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.\u2014</span><b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt Ajit\nVadakayil &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Their parents know how to save them<br />\n<br />\nIn India we have lakhs of amazing UNTRA SKILLED cottage industries who are NOT in the tax bracket OR covered by the stock market.<br />\n<br />\nINDIA MUST TWEAK ITS UNDERVALUED GDP CALCULATION METHOD A THIRD TIME.<br />\n<br />\nIndia\u2019s GDP which is undervalued must reflect our cottage industry production and our huge potential.<br />\n<br />\nThe western standard of living and their decadent way of life has nothing to do with India.<br />\n<br />\nAND HULLLLLOOOOO \u2014WE DO NOT WANT AMARTYA SEN TO SAVE INDIA. HE CAN SAVE HIS ROTHSCHILD WIFEs FAMILY.<br />\n<br />\nHow much does a Yank family save at the end of the month, as a percentage of his income? How much does an Indian family save ?<br />\n<br />\nIf GDP purports to measure economic activity which benefits society, the inclusion of government expenditures is dubious.\u2014to maintain prisons, to prevent crime, to sustain wars ( in foreign nations to establish puppet crypto Jew rulers) , to clean up pollution etc<br />\n<br />\nA country like USA is 18.6 trillion USD in external debt yet, the money spent is repaying / servicing this debt this is not reflected in a decreased GDP. We Indians are NOT stupid, NOT to figure out their GDP is a cult thingy<br />\n<br />\nAn Indian washes his own windows and GDP is unaffected; the white man in a high rise employ a window cleaner and output is boosted . He trashes his car on the highway and the costs of repairing it add to GDP. The production of cigarettes that cause lung cancer and handguns that are used in murders are also counted as a positive in GDP terms.<br />\n<br />\nThe flawed GDP measure method has created a society obsessed with mindless consumerism, in which the focus on growth has obscured the damage done to natural resources.<br />\n<br />\nIn India women are homemakers . We do NOT employ servants .<br />\n<br />\nUnpaid women\u2019s labor, for instance \u2014 running the household, raising the young, nurturing the sick and old parents \u2014 has little value.<br />\n<br />\nIf those same women join the ranks of Wall Street quantitative analysts, or old home nurses loolin after other\u2019s parents for moolah, their status suddenly yields high incomes and high contributions to GDP.<br />\n<br />\nThey value what they measure.<br />\n<br />\nIn India we do NOT need to measure our pricks and twats every hour.<br />\n<br />\nIn USA accidents, addictions, oil spills and war, all great boosts to GDP growth, and adds to our collective HILLY BILLY YANK well-being.<br />\n<br />\nThat using up vital resources depletes the collective natural capital, -- this liquidation of assets does not count against the GDP.<br />\n<br />\nGDP omits the astounding good work done in the Indian village home mostly by women. It values expenditure on war and nursing care on the same basis. It records the despoliation of the environment only by reference to the amount spent despoiling it, and then includes the amount spent to clean it up.<br />\n<br />\nIn USA if a ship is built at hajaaaar expense \u2014 whether it carried cargo or lay idle in a lay anchorage did NOT matter \u2013 this ship contributed to GDP. In India there is very little waste.<br />\n<br />\nGDP fails to accurately assess the value of goods and services provided or estimate a society\u2019s standard of living.<br />\n<br />\nOur way of life is NOT the same as the Yank and their rcowboy riding posse's ( alies/ coaltion ) way of life.<br />\n<br />\nOur life is based on happiness NOT pleasure and material pursuits like golf , dining at night under candle light drinking bullshit wine , and shaking gaand in a disco.<br />\n<br />\nWe do NOT care for Rothschild's rating agencies like Moody's who are just bouncers for big brother.<br />\n<br />\nFUCK OFF !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_104b+seedCyZ9D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_104b+seedCyZ9D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
